Sabina혪s happy life is shattered when her parents, along with her siblings Jimboy and Sara, are abducted and brought to Saladin, leaving her alone in the world of mortals at a very young age. Sabina will eventually find her way to Saladin with the help of Eloida, a Salamangka who was punished and exiled to the mortal world, which will be later revealed as her real mother, and her lover Argo who will train Sabina into becoming a very powerful Salamangka. Argo becomes the hero who himself possesses extraordinary powers and helps Sabina achieve the full potential of her inherent powers. Together, Sabina and Argo will discover how the power of their love for each other can do wonders to the intricate world of Saladin.

However, Hosokawa혪s promotion over all other executives who have been at Aoshima Manufacturing all their lives is greatly criticised by the people in the company. Shortly after he assumed his post, the world is plunged into a recession which has its roots in a financial crisis, and Aoshima Manufacturing is no exception. Its business falters. While in pursuit of the fugitive, she witnesses an unbelievable phenomenon: the founder of the Grid - a ghost from the past - has reappeared after 24 years. But why is she abetting the fugitive?

The members are emergency care professionals who go to sites of dangerous accidents and disasters using ER cars. Their ER car is a large vehicle equipped with the latest medical devices and an operating area where Tokyo MER saves the lives of the injured. 

Kitami Kota is a doctor for Tokyo MER and its leader. He holds firm convictions that he goes to accident sites to save lives regardless of the dangers.

But the young Juichi rebelled, left home, and cut off ties with his family. Now he혪s just learned that his father, having miraculously survived a critical illness, intends to marry his young caregiver and leave all his money to her. So Juichi decides to return home to help with his father혪s care, setting the stage for a showdown between Juichi혪s family on one side and his father혪s mysterious caregiver on the other.

synopsis: Miss Universe 1969 Dahlia Rodriguez-De Veyra throws an intimate dinner party to celebrate the centennial birthday of her late mother, who was crowned Miss Philippines 1939 and Manila혪s last Carnival Queen. Leading the guest list are her three headstrong daughters who are all international beauty pageant titlists, with the youngest being a transwoman whom the domineering Queen Mother disowned, ultimately tearing the family apart. In her attempt to reconcile with her daughters, will Dahlia be able to bring her family back together, or will it only reopen old wounds and reveal three generations of secrets and lies?

tag_names: Slight Comedy,Power Struggle,Nice Male Lead,Vanity,Agriculture,Cheerful Female Lead,Chinese Communist Party,Internet Celebrity,Village,Poor Family
synopsis:
Sun Guang Ming, the secretary of the Youth League Committee of the Bureau of Commerce, went to Dahuaishu Village as the first secretary in order to strengthen the grassroots training. He wanted to keep the results in the village and easily complete the tenure tasks, but because of the "poisonous vegetable incident", he was faced with the tricky work of removing the village.
Xu Hong, a reporter who reported on the "poisonous vegetable incident," was condemned from the heart to come back to rectify the name of Dahuaishu Village, which undoubtedly added chaos to Sun Guang Ming. Villager Liu Yu Jiu also returned to the village at this time, eager to seize the weakness of Liu Shi Rong, the parent of the Liu family, and tempted him to stand on the side of supporting the removal of the village.
The removal of the village seemed to be a foregone conclusion. Unexpectedly, the villagers held a farewell. During the ceremony, the grandmother cried and bid farewell to the grave of the unknown soldier who had been silently guarding for decades. All this moved Sun Guang Ming deeply and determined to keep Dahuaishu Village. He opened up the market with ecological vegetables, featured tourism, and used the Internet to finally promote Dahuaishu Village.

tag_names: Informer,Nationalism,Policeman,Kuomintang (KMT),Communist Rebel,Law Student,Social Justice,Chinese Republican Era,Cultural Revolution,Injustice
synopsis:
A story revolving around a fresh graduate who holds an idealistic view of what's right and wrong, yet realizes that the very institution he chose to serve falls heavily onto a gray area caught in the struggles during chaotic times. 
It takes place after the war has been won. Gu Yao Dong who grew up in Shanghai graduates from university. Hoping to fulfill his dreams of upholding the law and protecting the people, he succeeds in becoming a policeman. However, Gu Yao Dong is disheartened from the constant bullying by his peers and even gets caught deep in the political warfare between the Communists and the Nationalist. With the help of Xia Ji Cheng and Shen Qing He, he starts on a road to a revolution.

Name: Toshiie and Matsu
director: Inoue Tsuyoshi,  Motoki Kazuhiro,  Iseda Masaya,  Sato Mineyo
cast_names: Karasawa Toshiaki,Matsushima Nanako,Sorimachi Takashi,Takenouchi Yutaka,Matsudaira Ken,Kagawa Teruyuki
tag_names: Azuchi혯Momoyama Period,Slight Romance,Taiga,Older Man/Younger Woman,Married Couple,Strong Female Lead,Sengoku Period,Political
synopsis: The 41st NHK Taiga Drama is Toshiie to Matsu. During the turbulent Warring States Era, one man's life and career intertwined with the three great generals of Japanese history-Nobunaga, Hideyoshi, and Ieyasu. With political savvy and the support of his fiercely loyal wife, Maeda Toshiie rose to second in power in the shogunate and built up a fiefdom that encompassed Echizen, Noto and Kaga.

Name: My Treasure
cast_names: Vicky Chen,Liu Min Tao,Roy Chiu,Annie Liu,Liu Yi Jun,Tan Quan
tag_names: Mother-Daughter Relationship,Workplace,Slight Romance,Smart Female Lead,Mentor-Mentee,Poor Female Lead,Child Abandonment,Hardship,Overcoming Struggles,Older Man/Younger Woman
synopsis:
Life after graduation has not been easy for Qiu Dong Na. Stumbling along in her non-existent career, she had survived being picked on by her colleagues and being setup by her own boss. Now unemployed, she has no choice but to enter the company that she's been trying to avoid. The company is an accounting firm co-founded by an old acquaintance Gu Fei and her first love Bai Shi Chu's stepmother, Cheng Fan Yang.
Fei describes Dong Na as a 'handy knife'. She doesn't bow down to a challenge and completes seemingly impossible tasks. She also becomes weary of having a boss like Fei who is unconventional in many ways. In spite of the inequality brought by the income gap between the rich and poor and Fan Yang's doubts towards her, Dong Na draws strength from her mother, Qiu Xiao Xia, as she faces problems in work and in life.

Name: Love Songs Love Series To Be Continued: Close Friend
cast_names: Non Chanon Santinatornkul,Cookkai Pavadee Komchokpaisan,Proy Manasaporn Chanchalerm,Best Nathasit Kotimanuswanich,Peem Jaiyen Thanabordee,Aye Sarunchana Apisamaimongkol

cast_names: Nao,Tomaru Sayaka,Takahashi Yu,Negishi Toshie,Fukuyama Shodai,Nakamura Yuichi
synopsis: Nono Samejima, is a rickshaw rickshaw in Asakusa. Kukiko Yuge is a granddaughter of the landlord who lives in the same apartment. Alyssa Rivera is an international student. It tells a healing story that warms your body and mind about these three women visiting unique bathhouses. as they form "personal relationships".

Name: Poor Senorita
cast_names: Regine Velasquez,Mikael Daez,Sheena Halili,Jillian Ward,Valeen Montenegro,Jojit Lorenzo
synopsis: Rita was the only daughter of her father, Daniel who will later die of gastric cancer. Rita will later be diagnosed with gastric cancer like her father and warned that she three months left before she dies. Rita decides to give away and donate her assets. She will later discover that she was misdiagnosed. With no money and being pursued by a hitman, Rita hides and meets Kyla, Rambo, Charisse, Apol, and Girlie who will help her.

Name: Seirei no Moribito III
cast_names: Ayase Haruka,Itagaki Mizuki,Higashide Masahiro,Kora Kengo,Dean Fujioka,Fujiwara Tatsuya
tag_names: Badass Female Lead,Fantasy World,Bodyguard,Strong Female Lead,Adapted From A Novel,Prince Male Lead,Skilled Fighter,Female Bodyguard,Loyal Subject,Royalty
synopsis: Balsa and the crown prince Chagum travel together again. The young boy who survived because he was protected by Balsa, has gone through suffering and grown into a splendid crown prince. Balsa starts to expose the conspiracy that lies hidden deep in the bowels of her beautiful homeland of the Kingdom of Kambal. And then, Chagum stands up to the attack of the Talsh Empire which has targeted the New Yogo Empire. A natural disaster occurs that shakes the land. Gold birds flutter in the sky.

Name: I Am U
screenwriter: Ash Malanum,  Elmer L. Gatchalian,  Keavy Eunice Vicente
cast_names: Julia Barretto,Tony Labrusca,Ina Raymundo,Kokoy de Santos,Adrianna So,Cedrick Juan
tag_names: Investigation,Suspense,Doppelganger,Jealousy,Miniseries,Older Woman/Younger Man,Drama,Friendship
synopsis:
There are about six people in the world that you are unrelated to, but looks exactly like you. One of them can easily take over your life. Or you can take over theirs. 
Meeting your doppelganger is considered to be a bad omen. Ironically, Elise meets her doppelganger, Rose, when the latter tries to save her life.

Name: Asian Treasures
director: Eric Quizon,  Joel Lamangan,  Gina Alajar,  Mac Alejandre
cast_names: Robin Padilla,Angel Locsin,Marvin Agustin,Eddie Garcia,Ronaldo Valdez,Caridad Sanchez
tag_names: Treasure Hunting,Ancient Treasure,Secret Organization,Accident,Kidnapping,Filmed Abroad,Cult,Investigation,Drama,Suspense
synopsis: The story is about the hunt for the ten anting-anting (or powerful amulets) that serves as keys to the Asian Treasure. The Asian Treasure referred to is the treasure collected from all over Asia left by the ten Bornean Datus in the island of Panay. The treasures were locked in a cave and can only be opened through the ten anting-anting. The powers of the anting-anting made divisions among the datus; Datu Puti founded the KKK, while Sultan Makatunaw founded the Sudama. The two groups battled for the possession of all ten anting-anting and ownership the treasure. But as time passed, the amulets were lost and the Susama won the struggle. It is up for KKK members Gabriela Agoncillo (Angel Locsin) and Elias Pinaglabanan (Robin Padilla) to find the amulets and reclaim them for the KKK. Their quest took them to Thailand and China. They battled the Sudama and their leader, Victor  for the amulets to be used for their groups aims.

Name: Higuma 2
cast_names: Shigeoka Daiki,Kuroshima Yuina,Morikawa  Aoi,Komatsu Kazushige,Yamanishi Atsushi,Takei So
tag_names: Short Length Series,Miniseries,Animal
synopsis: This story is about a bear cub, who lives in a world where humans and bears coexist. It depicts how you get along with a new character while having hallucinations about hearing the word 'barbecue' constantly, and being afraid of tasting sukiyaki.

cast_names: Yang Zhi Gang,Zhang Zi Jian,Wang Kui Rong,Yue Li Na,Liu Zhi Yang,Dai Xiang Yu

cast_names: Motoki Masahiro,Matsu Takako,Maki Yoko,Imai Yuki,Mashima Hidekazu,Sasano Takashi

synopsis:
A newspaper reporter (Masahiro Motoki) uncovers a secret "Okinawa pact" between the Japanese and U.S. government. A woman who is the deputy director of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs becomes a key figure in the story. 

Based on Toyoko Yamasaki's 2009 novel "Unmei no Hito".

Name: The Eyas
cast_names: Yan Yi Kuan,Fan Shi Qi,Sun Yi,Li Mo Zhi,Xia Nan,Wang Hao Jun

On the basis of excellent completion of the study of the culture class, it has experienced the rough and tempered and bears the responsibility and pressure that the peers can not perceive. Start with the basics of flying and study the knowledge and skills of flying. After completing the physical experience, they also completed the reshaping of the soul, enhanced the awareness of national defence and the belief in resolutely defending the airspace of the motherland.

Name: Soonpoong Clinic
director: Kim Jin Young,  Kim Byung Wook
screenwriter: Song Jae Jung,  Yang Hee Seung,  Jun Hyun Jin

synopsis: This daily sitcom revolves around the quirky family who owns the Soonpoong Clinic, an obstetrics and gynecology hospital; the father, a gynecologist who is afraid of performing surgery, his wife, who has to take care of all the chores as well as the whole family, and the four very different daughters.

Name: Haunted
cast_names: Jib Pokchat Thiamchai,Yui Pattamawan Kaomulkadee,James Ruangsak Loychusak,Mai Sukontawa Kerdnimit,Natthew Nat Thewphaingam,Dew Pattarapol Kantapoj
tag_names: Ghost,Suspense

Name: Imagine Me Without You

tag_names: First Love Returns,Nice Female Lead,Orphan Female Lead,Traveling,Terminal Illness,Based On True Story,Divorced Parents,Childhood Connection,Naive Female Lead,Road Trip
synopsis: Lai Min and Ding Yi Zhou, two young people from Liuzhou, Guangxi, once attended elementary school together. Originally, their lives never intersected but because of Lai Min혪s hereditary family disease, the two met again and fell in love. As Lai Min혪s illness gradually worsens, she draws up a wishlist of places throughout China that she would like to visit. Ding Yi Zhou decides to help fulfill Lai Min's wish and together they embark on a trip across China.

Name: Precious Hearts Romances Presents: Alyna
cast_names: Jason Abalos,Kaye Abad,Sid Lucero,Shaina Magdayao,JM de Guzman,Dionne Monsanto
tag_names: Charismatic Lead,Cold Male Lead,Disappearance,Heartbreak,Pregnancy,Adapted From A Novel,Love Triangle
synopsis: Alyna is a woman who grew up feeling unloved until she meets Rex. He was fun, charismatic and immediately swept Alyna off her feet. When she thought she finally found love in the arms of Rex, he suddenly disappears. Alyna is left alone, heartbroken and carrying his child. In the search for Rex, Alyna crosses paths with Dominic - a sad, serious and cold man. But as the days progress, the fire in Alyna's heart blazes anew as she got to know the endearing qualities of Dominic. He could be the man Alyna was looking for all along. But Rex returns, promising to continue the love story he started weaving with Alyna. Who will Alyna choose - the man she loved first? Or the man who promises to love her forever?

Name: Gochisousan
cast_names: Watanabe Anne,Higashide Masahiro,Wada Masato,Yoshiyuki Kazuko,Zaizen Naomi,Harada Taizo
tag_names: Asadora,Hardworking Female Lead,Western Food,Meiji Period,Taisho Period,Showa Era,Strong Female Lead,Character Development,Cultural Difference,World War 2
synopsis: In the food themed drama, Uno Meiko is the daughter of parents who run a western style restaurant in Tokyo. She marries and moves to Osaka with her husband. Meiko experiences cultural differences between Tokyo and Osaka, as she lives as a mother and wife in Osaka.

Name: Little Nanay
cast_names: Kris Bernal,Chlaui Malayao,Bembol Roco,Nora Aunor,Eddie Garcia,Sunshine Dizon
tag_names: Tagalog,Single Mother,Childish Female Lead,Illness
synopsis:
Tinay is a mentally challenged teenager who despite her condition lives a happy life with her family made up of Lola Annie, Lolo Berto, and her half-brothers Peter Parker and Bruce Wayne. Her life, however, takes a different turn as she got pregnant by her childhood friend, Archie.
 
Little Nanay follows the adventures, struggles, and victories of Tinay as she raises her daughter, Chichie.

Name: Someone to Watch Over Me
cast_names: Tom Rodriguez,Lovi Poe,Max Collins,Edu Manzano,Ronnie Lazaro,Boy 2 Quizon
tag_names: Illness,Alzheimer's Disease
synopsis: This is a story of a wife's unwavering love for her husband who is suffering from early-onset Alzheimers disease. TJ Chavez, a playful and outgoing guy falls madly in love with Joanna and marries her. He and Joanna will face their biggest setback when he is diagnosed with the rare disorder. Joanna, will do everything for her sick husband even allowing Irene, TJs ex-girlfriend, into their lives and into their home. As Irene receives all of TJs love and affection, Joanna acts as TJs nurse who takes care of his needs. She tries to stay away from TJ but he keeps seeking her as her as he no longer recognizes Joanna as his wife. How far can Joanna still go and what else is she willing to do for her ill husband? Will TJ continue fighting for his love for Irene or will he finally remember Joanna as his wife and as someone who stayed with him despite his sickness and her pain?

Name: I Love You
cast_names: Ya Meng Le,Grace Zhang,Jack Li,Zhang Zhang,Jiang Yi Hao,Feng Kuang Jung
tag_names: Hardship,Supportive Family,Overcoming Struggles,Contemporary,Hardworking Female Lead,Family Relationship,Alzheimer's Disease,Friendship
synopsis: It tells the story of a group of contemporary young people and comes together with their own life dilemmas. They encourage and support each other and perform a comedy filled with love and warmth. Hong Qingqing led a difficult life with her sister, the six-year-old orphan Hongdou, and had to take care of Hongshan, the father of Alzheimer's. These seemingly "troubled" family members also gave Hong Qingqing a sense of home, until a truth that has been hidden for many years surfaced, and the relationship between Hong Qingqing and Meng Le also became uncertain due to a memory of St. Petersburg

Name: Like A Flowing River 2
cast_names: Wang Kai,Yang Shuo,Dong Zi Jian,Yang Cai Yu,Zhou Fang,Huo Qing
tag_names: Divorced Male Lead,Economy,Adapted From A Novel
synopsis:
Continuing the first season, Like a Flowing River II follows the story of Song Yun Hui, Lei Dong Bao, and Yang Xun as they take part in China혪s economic reform from the 1980s to the 1990s.

Song Yun Hui has been promoted as the youngest deputy leader in Donghai Chemical. He brings his family to live with him in Donghai, but his wife Cheng Kai Yan혪s laziness and distrust take a toll on their marriage that eventually ends in divorce. With his innate business capabilities, Song Yun Hui continues to take up leadership roles thus bringing his team success as they complete project after project. Sadly, Song Yun Hui's climb in the corporate ladder instils envy in those around him.
Xiao Lei's family business keeps growing with the times, yet a small blunder in the safety procedures causes a massive explosion in their copper factory. Lei Dong Bao is charged with bribery and sentenced to jail. After being released, he starts his own business as an electrical distributor. Wei Chun Hong, on the other hand, is always by his side, supporting and encouraging him.
Arriving in Donghai to seek opportunities, Yang Xun finds success in the current markets. While working with Liang Si Zhong, he starts to admire and develop feelings for her all while he continues to create fake accounts that harm the company. Liang Si Zhong혪s father discovers this and intervenes, dealing a huge blow to Yang Xun혪s career. As Yang Xun falls to the lowest point in his life, he finds comfort in someone close to him.

Name: Genesis
cast_names: Dingdong Dantes,Rhian Ramos,Lorna Tolentino,TJ Trinidad,Lauren Young,Irma Adlawan
synopsis: Genesis is a Philippine television drama science fiction series broadcast by GMA Network.

Name: Dyosa
cast_names: Anne Curtis,Sam Milby,Luis Manzano,Zanjoe Marudo,Jaclyn Jose,Lloyd Samartino
synopsis: Josephine, a young orphan who is unaware of her true destiny as the Chosen One, finally finds out that she was born with extraordinary abilities. As she turns 18, she learns that her divine powers were meant to save humankind from the evil creatures of the Lower Earth. But even a Dyosa would fall in love with a man who loves her back. Will she give up her immortality and ignore her responsibility to be with the only person who has given her a reason for living?

Name: Talking Bones
cast_names: Zhang Ling Xin,Gao Ren,Cai Yi Da,Wu Man Si,Zhang Jia Ding,Jenny Zhang
tag_names: Forensic Medical Examiner,Forensic,Based On True Story,Investigation,Detective,Suspense
synopsis:
The story revolves around Shang Jie, the overly critical head of a crime investigation team, Xia Ying, a forensic examiner who is completely engrossed with her profession, Li Xue Kai, a detective and a good tracker, Song Mi, an innocent and ditsy analyst and Ying Ming, a second-generation rich who works as a criminal psychologist. The five form an unlikely team as they are the rejects of the department, yet through teamwork and dedication, they succeed in solving the most unusual murder cases.

~~ This drama was adapted from the real case of Wang Xue Mei, the Chinese chief female forensic doctor. Based on thirty years of real-life experiences accumulated by Wang Xue Mei who is the first female forensic expert in China.

Name: No Side Game
cast_names: Oizumi Yo,Matsu Takako,Kamikawa Takaya,Saigo Teruhiko,Otani Ryohei,Sasamoto Rena
tag_names: Adapted From A Novel
synopsis: Kimijima Hayato works for a big manufacturing company. He wants to be successful at his job and he is mentioned for a promotion, but he opposes the company undertaking a project led by his boss. This leads to Kimijima Hayato being demoted to a chief of general affairs position at a factory in the province. He is also ordered to work as the general manager of the company's rugby team named Astros. The Astros were once a formidable team, but they have been losers in their recent past. Kimijima Hayato hopes to regain his standing at the company by rebuilding the Astros into a powerhouse, but he doesn't have any knowledge about rugby.

Name: Bagman: Season 2
cast_names: Arjo Atayde,Carlo Aquino,Rosanna Roces,Victor Sy,Jess Mendoza
tag_names: Miniseries,Corruption,Suspense
synopsis:
With a hitman out on the loose to take him down, Benjo's new job as the governor of Magdiwang becomes even more complicated. Follow his journey in this new season of Bagman!

Source: tfc.tv

Name: The Hunting Genius
cast_names: Hu Yun Hao,Qian Di Di,Kenny Bee,Fu Jia,Camille Hua,Xu Shao Wu
tag_names: Tracing,Detective Agency,Missing Father,Missing Person,Investigation,Detective,Friendship,Suspense
synopsis: Lin Yuan Su meets Die Qi, Qiu Ling, Xia Gu Duo, and Zhou Qi after they all participate in a search for a missing dog. The five people are of different ages, come from different backgrounds, and have very different personalities, but they decide to form an agency that looks for missing people in their free time. At first, they don't see eye-to-eye, but after some time they form a strong friendship. Through their experiences of looking for missing people, they each also find themselves and understand the true purpose of looking for people. As the unlikely group of 5 gets closer, Lin Yuan Su finds the courage to start looking for his father, who has been missing for 22 years, and enlists his fellow hunters in helping him.

Name: Paper Cut
cast_names: Li Jian,Zhou Shi Xuan,Betty Yao,Zhang Yi Mu,Fu Xiao Na,Zhang Jing Chu
tag_names: Death Of A Parent,Loan Shark,Debt,Divorce
synopsis:
A story that follows Tian Chuang Hua, the Ma family's daughter-in-law who undergoes many hardships in her life, yet gathers up the strength to help her own village.

Tian Chuang Hua has always been a dutiful wife and daughter-in-law. She had hoped that her husband could return home to spend the new year with family, but was greeted with a set of divorce papers. Tian Chuang Hua and her own daughter have problems of their own and debtors are knocking on their door. At this time, her worst nightmare comes true. She learns that her father has passed away, but continued to be filial to her in-laws.

Tian Chuang Hua's kindness does not go unnoticed as her parents-in-law accept her over their own son. Even with the trials and tribulations, she learns to overcome her problems one at a time and starts on a venture to developing tourism for the village. By chance, she discovers that her mother-in-law's paper-cutting skills are a treasured art form.

Name: Manatsu no Shonen: 19452020
cast_names: Iwasaki Taisho,Sato Ryuga,Nasu Yuto,Ukisho Hidaka,Fujii Naoki,Kanasashi Issei
tag_names: Student,World War 2,Miniseries
synopsis:
Ryuji (Taisho Iwasaki), Satoru (Ryuga Sato) and Atsushi (Hidaka Ukisho) are friends in high school. They are classmates in the 2nd grade class B. They appear like troubled students, but they are not. They are actually country boys.

When they are at their secret place, they suddenly feel a big shake and hear the sound of thunder. Then next moment, they see a man Sanpei wearing a dirty military uniform with a backpack and holding a bayonet. Sanpei came from the past, right before the end of the war in Guam. Ryuji, Satoru and Atsushi enjoy their time with Sanpei. They think that being with Sanpei, their lives might change and they ask him to spend summer with them. Class President Michifumi (Yuto Nasu) and twin brothers Akihiko (Naoki Fujii) and Kazuhiko (Issei Kanasashi) join the group.

Name: Battlefield 1938
cast_names: Liao Fan,Yang Shuo,Lu Xia,Ni Da Hong,Zhang Yi,Wang Li Wen
synopsis:
The story is based on the cooperation and friendship of four different young men. It depicts the cruel youth growth story of their soul purgatory, and tells a priceless civilian anti-war legend.


Source: DramaWiki

tag_names: Prophecy,See Visions,Dilemmas,Battle,Forbidden Love,Betrayal,Special Power,Werewolf,Character Development,Love Triangle
synopsis: It follows the story of Lia, the daughter of Noah and Lyka. She is the chosen one for the werewolf clan and has strong powers that can burn vampires. Her fateful meeting with Mateo will change the course of her life and sets the prophecy of an epic battle between vampires and Lobos that will finally decide the one blood that shall rule all.

Name: Daisho

tag_names: Psychopath,Physical Abuse,Death Of A Parent,Torture,Child Abuse,Kidnapping,Obsession,Incest,School Bullying,Suspense
synopsis: Okuyama Keisuke is a successful lawyer with a dark past. He suffers from severe obsessive-compulsive disorder as a result of abuse and betrayal when he was a young boy. One day, Keisuke is asked to defend his distant relative and psychopath 혫friend혬, Ando Tatsuya, who is a suspect in a murder case. Tatsuya had robbed him of his own parents and happiness one after another. After that, he was repeatedly mistreated by Tatsuya혪s family who adopted him. Keisuke takes a risky gamble to bury Tatsuya from society. Their reunion is the start of a battle with a new nightmare.

Name: The Shadow of Empress Wu

Name: Cherry Blossoms After Winter
cast_names: Ok Jin Uk,Kang Hui,Lee Hyun Kyung,Cha Gun,Johyun,Kim Hyun Wook
tag_names: Gay Male Lead,Gay Romance,LGBTQ+,Adapted From A Webtoon,Short Length Series,Bullied Male Lead,Dead Parents,Shy Male Lead,Miniseries,High School
synopsis:
The death of his parents forces a seven-year-old boy named Seo Hae Bom to move in with an adoptive family who have a young son of the same age named Jo Tae Seong. Seo Hae Bom is in awe of Jo Tae Seong 혯 he considers the boy to be everything that he is not: tall, handsome, popular, caring, and worthy of love and attention. The diminutive Seo Hae Bom thinks himself inferior and is humbled by the kindness of the family that took him in.

Things become slightly different for the duo, however, after Seo Hae Bom and Jo Tae Seong end up in the same high school class. All of a sudden, they are spending more time than ever together at home and at school. Although they have developed a sort of brotherly love, now united in the same class, an unexpected romantic spark ignites between the two 혯 but what will Cupid have to say about all this?

Name: Daddy Fish
cast_names: Jeong Bo Seok,Yoo Seung Ho,Park Ji Young,Park Geun Hyung,Yun Kyu Jin,Kim Jung Nan
tag_names: Sick Son,Miniseries,Father-Son Relationship
synopsis: This drama is about the love of a father for his son who has leukemia.

Name: Heroes In Harm's Way

screenwriter: Guo Jing Yu,  Tang Qi Cen,  Tian Liang Liang
cast_names: Chen Shu,Wang Zhi Fei,Yang Zhi Gang,Jiang Yan,Sa Ri Na,Li  Yi Xiao
tag_names: Epidemic,Omnibus,Multiple Mains,Inspired By Real Events,COVID-19,Nurse Female Lead,Doctor Female Lead,Doctor Male Lead
synopsis: Tells the story of ordinary folks and their battle against the Covid19 pandemic.

Name: Lion no Oyatsu
cast_names: Tsuchimura Kaho,Ryusei Ryo,Suzuki Kyoka,Wada Masato,Kato Kazuko,Hamada Mari
tag_names: Patient,Hospice Care,Healing,Tearjerker,Father-Daughter Relationship,Death,Life Lesson,Terminal Illness,Character Development,Cooking
synopsis: The "Lion's House" is the name of a hospice located on a beautiful island. The people who live there are people with a short life expectancy. Shizuku, a 29-year-old who was told how long she had to live at a young age, comes to live there. She feels a little regretful over not being able to improve her relationship with her family before coming. At the "Lion's House", snack time is a time where the residents are allowed to request a snack from their memories but Shizuku is unable to choose. The days of laughter and tears begin alongside the other residents. What does Shizuku find and leave behind in the last days of her life?

Name: Golden Wagon
cast_names: Im Ji Eun,Uhm Ji Won,Lee In Hye,Lee Joo Hyun,Park Jung Soo,Yeo Woon Kye

Name: Fumo Chitai
director: Mizuta Naruhide,  Hirano Shin,  Sawada Kensaku
cast_names: Karasawa Toshiaki,Koyuki,Tabe Mikako,Takenouchi Yutaka,Matsushige Yutaka,Saitoh Takumi
tag_names: Adapted From A Novel,Showa Era
synopsis:
Iki Tadashi is a military leader who was captured by the Soviets during World War II. Treated as a war criminal, he was sentenced to many years of labor in a harsh Siberian detention camp. After 11 years of imprisonment, he is released. He returns to Japan and begins readjusting to life as a civilian, rejecting an offer from his former colleague to work on a defense project. Tadashi has decided to never involve himself in war again, much to the joy of his family. Instead, he attempts to set off on a new path working at a major trading company. 

--Tokyograph

Name: Curling Girls
cast_names: Jiang Zhi Nan,Yang Yue,Zhou Qian Xiao,Joy,Gao Tian,Crystal Wang
tag_names: Adapted From A Web Novel,Web Series
synopsis: Xia Tang Yuan tried to join the Zhongbei Women's Curling Team to get closer to the handsome curling prince, but was turned down by the serious coach, Zhao Yi Bing. At this time, the Zhongbei Women's Curling Team was about to be disbanded and in need of new players to join a competition. An incident led to the discovery that Xia Tang Yuan actually had talent for the sport, which also made Zhao Yi Bing break her defense and have Xia Tang Yuan successfully join the team.

Name: Sego-don
cast_names: Suzuki Ryohei,Nagayama Eita,Kitagawa Keiko,Kuroki Haru,Matsuzaka Keiko,Kazama Morio
tag_names: Historical Figure,Mariko Hayashi,Taiga,Meiji Period,Edo Period,Samurai,Adapted From A Novel,Based On True Story,Political,Melodrama
synopsis: Segodon follows the life of historical figure Takamori Saigo. He was born the first son of a lower-class samurai. He was exiled two times and went through three marriages. Takamori Saigo was one of the central figures of the Meiji Restoration but later rebelled against the government over dissatisfaction with Meiji reforms.

Name: New World
cast_names: Yin Fang,Sun Hong Lei,Wan Qian,Edward Zhang,Li Chun,Sophia Hu
tag_names: Revolution,Brothers
synopsis:
Set in the city of Beiping during the 22 days before the founding of the People's Republic of China in 1949 is a story about the drastic changes in the lives of three brothers Jin Hai, Tie Lin, and Xu Tian as well as a romance between Xu Tian and Tian Dan.
In investigating the murder that claimed the life of his fiancee, policeman Xu Tian starts on a trail that will eventually lead to his involvement in the liberation of Beiping. Jin Hai, Tie Lin, and Xu Tian are three friends who are as close as brothers. In the face of historic changes and conflicting beliefs, they make choices that take them on diverging paths. Xu Tian and communist member Tian Dan meet during their lowest moments and find a common goal that brings them together.

Name: If You Only Knew
director: Kim Hyoung Seok,  Jun Chang Geun
cast_names: Cha Soo Yeon,Oh Yoon Ah,Ji Hyun Woo,Kang Ji Hwan,Jung Kyung Ho,Lee Soo Kyung

Name: Sleepless Society: Insomnia
cast_names: Aokbab Chutimon Chuengcharoensukying,Best Nathasit Kotimanuswanich,Gee Sutthirak Subvijitra,JingJing Warisara Yu,Puyfah Sita Maharavidejakorn,Ampere Suttatip Wutchaipradit

These dreams cause insomnia, eventually leading up to chronic insomnia to the point that she is confused and begins to separate reality and dreams.

She teams up with veteran reporter Kameyama Takako to depict the personal struggles of women which aren't considered newsworthy.

The Four Herans of the Etherian Kingdom are plotting revenge against the Sang'gre's who, for the 2nd time took down their beloved Kingdom.

Name: Carnation

Although she was a successful designer in Japan, she also single-handedly raised three daughters who followed in her footsteps to become internationally known designers, named Hiroko, Junko, and Michiko.

Name: Iribito

tag_names: Adapted From A Novel,Pregnant Female Lead,Genius Female Lead,Art Gallery,Painter,Bankruptcy,Gallery Curator,Dysfunctional Family,Smart Female Lead,Rich Female Lead
synopsis:
Naho is the deputy curator of the art gallery established by her grandfather, an avid art collector. Naho's husband is the managing director at a different art gallery in Ginza which his family has run for several generations. 
To avoid the hectic pace of Tokyo, a pregnant Naho decides to move to Kyoto. There, she finds a painting by an unknown painter. She becomes fascinated with it and soon faces an unexpected truth.

Name: Perfect Love
cast_names: Kim Hee Ae,Cha In Pyo,Lee Seung Yeon,Park Ji Bin,Kim Sung Won,Park Ji Young
synopsis:
The course of the husband learning the true meaning of love, when his wife struggle for her life with deadly sickness This love story illustrates the conflicts and dynamics of an older wife, who lives her life to the fullest despite her poor background, and a younger husband of hers, who was raised in an affluent upper class family. The process of them falling in love, getting married, and facing the difficulties along the way, is portrayed and the course of the juvenile husband learning the true meanings of love, when his wife struggles for her life with deadly sickness, is tragically and beautifully illustrated.

[AsianMediaWiki]

Name: Gegege no Nyobo
director: Ichiki Masae,  Katsuta Natsuko,  Watanabe Yoshio

Name: Darker 2
screenwriter: Zhang Yuan Ang,  Bai Yi Cong
cast_names: Li Qian,Vera Lu,Zhang Rui Han,Guo Jing Fei,Su Dan,Qu Shao Shi
tag_names: Investigation,Detective,Slight Horror,Slight Comedy,Attempted Suicide,Slight Romance,Crime Solving,Death,Murder,Suspense
synopsis: The special task force is adrift after their epic loss to Darker, the mastermind behind series of high profile vigilante killings. With their captain on the run for murder and them no closer to catching Darker, the team switches gear and investigates a decades-old hostage case. In those dusty old files, they discover Darker's real identity and a possible police cover up, but establishing the wrongdoer and the aggrieved party proven more difficult than it seemed. The team must determine the true culprit before Darker does, lest he kills his way through the suspect list.

Name: Spy
cast_names: Dan Worrawech Danuwong,Jack Chaleumpol Tikumpornteerawong,Pattie Ungsumalynn Sirapatsakmetha,Ter Chantavit Dhanasevi,Jaturong Mokjok,Janesuda Parnto
tag_names: Detective Agency,Extramarital Affair,Investigation,Detective
synopsis: Can a handsome private detective focus on his work when beautiful clients and other people distract him? Chalam is a private detective who uses a pet shop as a front. He tries to get his work done, despite the meddling help of Kanoon, the son of a motorcycle king who lives next door, and Amm, a sweet girl who works at a minimart nearby. When most of his clients are cheating spouses, can Chalam help his clients through their complicated marriages without getting personally involved?

Name: Indio
cast_names: Rhian Ramos,Jennylyn Mercado,Vaness del Moral-Kier,Robert Arevalo,Daria Ramirez,Chinggoy Alonzo
synopsis:
The story begins in Central Visayas followed by the death of Amaya and Bagani, and the story was setting during the pre-colonial period, where human natives and diwatas (Visayan gods and goddesses) are living together in harmony, harvesting the bounty of the earth and sea, guided and loved by Laon (the Creator).

Ynaguiguinid, the goddess of war, who have fallen in love and had chosen to marry a warrior tribesman lives with their newborn child, a demigod. But they had to face a pitiful separation when chaos, confusion, death and destruction comes with the arrival of the Spaniards conquistadors whose aim is to spread Christianity and at the same time, to take control of the strategic trade routes and to control the resources of the archipelago.

Name: Shinhannin Flag 2
director: Nakajima Satoru,  Komuro Naoko,  Sakuma Noriyoshi
cast_names: Nishijima Hidetoshi,Miyazawa Rie,Yoshine Kyoko,Hara Nanoka,Kobayashi Masahito,Masana Bokuzo
tag_names: Co-Workers,Married Couple,Investigation
synopsis: Sagara Ryosuke is an ordinary salaryman and he works for a mid-size shipping company. He is a good natured person. His family consists of his wife Maho, high school student daughter and elementary school student son. Maho works part-time at a supermarket. They are a happy family, but, Maho and their two children suddenly disappear. There are no clues about their disappearance. Ryosuke gets the attention of the media and public. He tries to find the truth behind his family's disappearance with the help of his subordinate Ninomiya Mizuho at work.

Name: Mea Culpa
cast_names: Jodi Sta. Maria,Bela Padilla,Tony Labrusca,Ketchup Eusebio,Ivana Alawi,Maria Isabel Lopez
tag_names: Investigation,Suspense,Accident
synopsis: Based on the trailer, which first premiered during the ABS-CBN trade event, the lives of Juris and Fina will get entangled because of a lost baby. Juris and her friends figured in an car accident where they hit and killed the person carrying the baby, who luckily survived.They will undergo interrogation and Vina will do everything to find her child and seek justice for what happened.

Name: A Love to Last: Season 1
cast_names: Ian Veneracion,Bea Alonzo,Iza Calzado,Julia Barretto,Claire Ruiz,Lui Manansala
synopsis: The story follows two different people, Andeng and Anton, that will prove if two broken hearts can make their love last or not.

Name: Tawun Thud Burapah
cast_names: Pong Nawat Kulrattanarak,Son Yuke Songpaisan,Mo Monchanok Saengchaipiangpen,Pango Jintanutda Lummakanon,Hiranpruk Puri,Ak Akarat Nimitchai
tag_names: Investigation,Mystery,Suspense,Mafia,Spy,Policeman,Brotherhood,Family Relationship,Vengeance,Betrayal
synopsis: Burapa and Tawan are brothers and the sons of a well-known cop. They are very close as brothers. Burapa is into boxing, while Tawan wants to follow in their father혪s footsteps to become a cop. One day, they hear a gun shot and go to see what is going on. This way, they witness a murder and when the time comes to point the finger at the killer, Tawan is not hesitant to do the right thing. Burapa knows that the bad guys will not leave their family alone and he begs Tawan not to be a witness. This is how the conflict begins.

Name: Yell
screenwriter: Shimizu Yukako,  Shimada Ureha,  Hayashi Koji
cast_names: Kubota Masataka,Nikaido Fumi,Karasawa Toshiaki,Kikuchi Momoko,Sakumoto Takara,Kazama Morio
tag_names: Asadora,Friendship,Based On True Story,Drama,Short Length Series,Talented Female Lead,Talented Male Lead,Composer,Musician,Older Man/Younger Woman
synopsis:
The story is based on the life of a japanese composer named Yuji Koseki from Fukushima in the Showa Era.

In 1909, a long-awaited baby boy was born to a family which has run a dry goods store for generations in Fukushima Prefecture. He would later become the talented composer Koyama Yuichi who wrote many famous songs. Although Yuichi was brought up as the heir of the business, he was rather dreamy and considered a child with no redeeming traits by the people around him. However, when he encountered music, it sparked joy and unleashed his gift in composing music through self-study. As a youth, Yuichi secretly put his name down for an overseas songwriting competition. This would change his destiny. He won runner-up for the song he entered for the competition. As a result, he got to know a female student who wanted to be a singer. Despite the long distance between them 혯 Fukushima and Toyohashi 혯 the two of them tied the knot. When they came to Tokyo, they met all sorts of people and weathered a dark period to produce a number of hit songs. However, war broke out and Yuichi had to compose wartime songs at the army혪s request. It pained him that young men died in battle after singing the songs he had written. After the war, the country began to recover amid the chaos. The couple made a new era of music in an attempt to encourage the wounded through the power of music.

Name: My Date with a Vampire II
cast_names: Kristy Yeung,Eric Wan ,Chapman To,Joey Meng,Berg Ng,Kenneth Chan
tag_names: Vampire
synopsis:
The story in the second season is a reboot of the first season but the main characters' names and roles are still similar to those in the first season. Some new characters and new subplots are also introduced in this season.
In My Date with a Vampire II, Fong Kwok-wah and Yamamoto Ichifu clash again in 1938 and their fight arouses the attention of Cheung San (the progenitor of all vampires), who interrupts the fight. Just as Cheung San is about to bite the two men and turn them into vampires, Ma Dan-na appears and attacks Cheung San, driving him away, thus sparing Fong and Yamamoto from their fates. Not long later, Fong agrees to help Ma hunt down and destroy Cheung San. They succeed in trapping Cheung San but he breaks free and bites Fong and the boy Fuk-sang (who is nearby), transforming them into vampires.
Fong Kwok-wah and Fuk-sang survive until the present-day (1990s) and their physical appearances have not changed since 60 years ago. However, before Fong became a vampire, he already had a son with his wife Sau, so he now has a grandson named Fong Tin-yau. Fong Tin-yau is killed in an incident in England so Fong Kwok-wah impersonates his grandson. He meets Ma Siu-ling (a descendant of Ma Dan-na), the heiress to a clan of ghostbusters who have dedicated themselves to ridding the world of evil supernatural beings. Fong starts a romance with Ma. (Wikipedia)

Name: I Will Find You a Better Home
cast_names: Betty Sun,Luo Jin,Alina Zhang,Tian Lei,Yang Hao Yu,Zhang Xiao Qian
tag_names: Strong Female Lead,Cohabitation,Calm Male Lead,Slow Romance,Slice Of Life,Smart Male Lead,Dog,Real Estate Agent Female Lead,Real Estate Industry,Calm Female Lead
synopsis: Fang Si Jin is a rising star at her real estate company headquarters. Her mentor dispatches her to the Jinyi branch in Shanghai, which has been suffering from declining sales. Si Jin joins the store as a double-manager with Xu Wen Chang, a "nobleman" who is kind and can't bear to fire his underperforming employees. Initially disdainful of Wen Chang혪s benevolence, Si Jin focuses on instilling greater discipline within the team. But unlike the cutthroat environment at HQ, the warm and inviting atmosphere of Jinyi혪s branch has its own value too. Si Jin혪s new team supports one another as they strive to help their clients settle down and build their lives. And as Si Jin grows closer to Wen Chang, they both gain something unexpected혰the sense of home they혪ve always yearned for.

Name: Pitsawat
cast_names: Nune Woranuch Bhirombhakdi,Pong Nawat Kulrattanarak,Jes Jespipat Tilapornputt,Plai Paramej Noiam,Wit Phutharit Prombandal,Lek Porjet Kenpet
tag_names: Revenge,Reincarnation,Murder,Ayutthaya Period,Supernatural Being,National Treasure,Guardian Spirit,Eternal Love,Powerful Female Lead,Patriotic Male Lead
synopsis:
Present Life:
Akkanee is an archaeologist who loves antique so much. He already has a lover who is Thipapa, but they are not yet married because it seems like he is waiting for someone.
That's when Sarochinee came into his life. She is a beautiful and mysterious woman. She is a millionaires who also loves antique from the Ayutthaya period. Most importantly, she has a piece of Siraporn, which Akkanee is researching. When Sarochinee appeared, she caused fear in many people around her. Nobody can answer why unnatural deaths occur with people around her. Everybody whoever breaks a promise has to die. Nobody knows why, but everybody feels that Sarochinee is somehow involved.
Sarochinee's arrival brings back the past of Ubon, a woman from Ayutthaya. Karma starts to circle again, until everybody reincarnates, and meets together in this present lifetime. This is just the beginning.
Past Life:
Akkanee is a soldier in Ayutthaya's ending period. He killed Ubon, who is his wife. He sacrificed her to protect the nation's treasure. Ubon was very angry at Akkanee. Because of his actions, she was cursed for centuries and was not able to reincarnate. The Heavens pitied her and allowed her to find a successor that will take her place. If Ubon can't find a successor, she won't be able to reincarnate again and has to remain a protector of the treasure for eternity. For this reason, Ubon came back as Sarochinee. She come to take Akkanee's life as her next successor.

Name: Special Duty Elite
cast_names: Andy Zhang,Su Qing,Li Nai Wen,Bao Wen Jing,June Zhao,Wu Hong
tag_names: Youth

cast_names: Choi Jong Hoon,Kim Jae Woo,Kim Ho Chang,Lee Yong Joo,Kim Sung Won,Song Young Jae

tag_names: Separated Family,Family Conflict,Family Dispute,Family Relationship,Adult Romance,Divorce,Enemies To Lovers,Step Family,Office Romance,Marriage
synopsis: The story is about a couple who navigates the traditional expectations attached to marriage that extends beyond one's partner including their family and friends.

Name: Mi wo Tsukushi Ryouricho
cast_names: Kuroki Haru,Moriyama Mirai,Nagayama Kento,Kohinata Fumiyo,Yasuda Narumi,Aso Yumi
tag_names: Edo Period,Adapted From A Novel
synopsis: In 1802, 8-year-old Mio lost her parents in a river flood in Osaka and feels all alone after she is also separated from her childhood friend Noe. She is saved by Yoshi, the proprietress of 혩Tenman Icchoan혪, one of Osaka혪s famous restaurants, whom she happened to meet. Mio begins training as a cook because of her gift for taste in a time when females were still banned from the kitchen. However, the restaurant was burnt down in a fire and she sets off for Edo with Yoshi and her husband Kahei. By some lucky coincidence, they are invited by Taneichi, the owner of 혩Tsurya혪, to work at his soba shop. Mio is bewildered by the contrasting flavors of the Kansai region and Edo, and also has to deal with the obstructions of a rival shop and a status difference in her love with the samurai Komatsubara. She overcomes these difficulties and eventually becomes a top female cook.

Name: Seiten wo Tsuke
director: Murahashi Naoki,  Tanaka Kenji,  Kawano Hideaki,  Kurosaki Hiroshi
cast_names: Yoshizawa Ryo,Kobayashi Kaoru,Wakui Emi,Murakawa Eri,Fujino Ryoko,Kora Kengo
tag_names: Taiga,Economy,Politics,Biographical,Samurai,Bakumatsu,Bank
synopsis: Shibusawa Eiichi was born in 1840 to a farmer혪s family. He grew up helping his family with work, which was to manufacture and sell indigo production and also silk farming. He left his hometown at the age of 23 and began working for the government. He later traveled to Paris and learned about banking. Upon his return to Japan, he helped build up the first modern bank in Japan. He eventually became a founder or supporter to about 500 companies and was involved with about 600 public services, including education for women.

Name: Watashitachi ga Puropozusarenai no ni wa, 101 no Riyuu ga Atte da na
screenwriter: Sato Jiro,  Watanabe Chiho,  Fujii Kiyomi,  Nagata Yuko,  Kusuno Ichiro,  Inukai Kyoko

Name: Waiting For You In The Future
cast_names: Li Guang Jie,Fei Qi Ming,Sun Qian,Jelly,Yao Qing Ren,Xin Yun Lai
tag_names: Strong Friendship,Bromance,Time Travel,Teenager,Shy Male Lead,Teacher,Contract Relationship,Childhood Friends,Idol,Adapted From A Novel
synopsis:
A middle-aged man time travels to the past to become a teacher to his 17-year-old classmates.
Hao Hui Gui is a 36-year-old high school teacher who is still single. During a gathering, he gets into a huge disagreement with everyone present and even gets into a fistfight with his best friend. Upon returning home, he mindlessly flips through his personal diary from 20 years ago and starts to recall many memories from the past. He falls asleep eventually and meets with his younger self in his dreams.

Name: Koo See Pee Meu Bprab
cast_names: Tik Jesdaporn Pholdee,Krit Shahkrit Yamnam,Rodmay Kaneungnij Jaksamittanon,Mardthong Sarawut,Kessarin Ektawatkul,Beam Sarunyu Prachakrit

Name: The Half Sisters
cast_names: Barbie Forteza,Thea Tolentino,Jean Garcia,Derrick Monasterio,Cherie Gil,Jak Roberto
tag_names: Different Father,Rich Family,Good Twin/Evil Twin
synopsis: The series of twin sisters about family, Rina and Alfred marriage and formerly boyfriend Benjie also she got pregnant and give a birth for twin baby girls. The DNA test was identification will become father with Rina are called hetero-paternal superfecundation.

Name: Heroes
director: Bai Shan,  Liu Fang,  Bai Shan
cast_names: Vincent Zhao,Mao Lin Lin,Ashton Chen,Wu Chao,Tay Ping Hui,Ryan Kou
tag_names: Martial Artist,Strong Male Lead,Fight,Chinese Republican Era,Biographical,Qing Dynasty,Death,Trap,Adapted From A Novel
synopsis:
The Refornment Movement of 1898 resulted in the "Six Heroes" dying. Huo Yuan Jia, who was filled with patriotic enthusiasm, had been eager to participate; however, he fell into the enemy's trap and could only watch as the heroes of the country died. Not long after, China was invaded by the enemy.
A year later, Huo Yuan Jia who was now living in ChangZhou took a stroll along the mountainside. Discouraged by his past and in fear of falling into the enemy's trap again, he decided to move to Shanghai. Huo Yuan Jia's following a reputation grew quickly. The Japanese (who had invaded China) grew worried and began to provoke Huo Yuan Jia. Huo Yuan Jia fearlessly charged into battle and finally defeated the enemy with his courageous actions.

Name: Ultraman Mebius
director: Konaka Kazuya,  Yagi Takeshi,  Kaji Kengo
cast_names: Igarashi Shunji,Nishina Masaki,Saikawa Ai,Watanabe Daisuke,Hirata Misato,Uchino Kenta
tag_names: Superhero
synopsis:
Mebius is a rookie Ultra Warrior and has a lot to live up to. He is chosen as the new protector of the earth. This series is set in the same universe as the original timeline; when Mebius first appears to fight a monster, it is mentioned that this is the first time an Ultraman has appeared on earth in 25 years. Under the guise of Mirai Hibino, Mebius joins CREW GUYS, the monster attack force of this series.

At the start of the first episode, all of the original team members of GUYS, save Ryu, are killed off in their first monster battle. Mirai gathers a group of people he meets in an evacuation to join the new GUYS because he feels they have the right heart to be on GUYS.

Name: Women Above Flowers
cast_names: Sa Kang,Choi Myung Gil,Woo Hee Jin,Lee Joo Hyun,Im Ho,Kim Seung Hwan
synopsis: Between man and society, people and customs, and between individuals, there exists invisible walls that separate each entity, preventing them from overstepping boundaries, but also from truly understanding each other. This is the story of strong women who are determined to break down these walls in order to achieve success in their work and relationships.

Name: Yakeni Ben no Tatsu Bengoshi ga Gakko de Hoeru
cast_names: Kamiki Ryunosuke,Tanabe Seiichi,Minami Kaho,Kishii Yukino,Sato Ryuta,Hamada Mari
tag_names: Lawyer Male Lead,Teacher,High School,Student,Middle School,School Bullying
synopsis: Shotaro Taguchi is a newly recruited attorney. As part of a new "school lawyer system", he is sent to a middle school. There he encounters an angry student혪s guardian who came to complain about her daughter's corporal punishment. The guardian threatens to sue the school but Taguchi kicks the person out of school.  A few days later, the corporal punishment issue develops into an unexpected situation. The guardian sends a document with the student's homeroom teacher Mochizuki's signature, admitting to using corporal punishment on the student.

Name: Barefoot Love
cast_names: Im Ho,Park Joon Hyuk,Oh Yoo Na,Jeon Hye Jin,Park Jung Soo,Yoon Hye Kyung

Name: Asami Mitsuhiko

Name: TV Novel: Beautiful Days

tag_names: Brother-Sister Relationship,Shy Female Lead,Secondary Couple,Bickering Couple,Playboy Male Lead,Older Man/Younger Woman,Opposites Attract,1970s,Mother-Daughter Relationship,Father-Son Relationship

Name: Kami no Te
cast_names: Shiina Kippei ,Sugimoto Tetta,Suzuki Sawa,Kitamura Yukiya,Hoshino Mari,Kondo Masaomi
tag_names: Kusakabe Yo,Adapted From A Novel,Terminal Illness,Cancer
synopsis: Shirakawa is a surgeon. His 21-year-old patient Shotaro has terminal cancer. Shirakawa tries everything he can, but it doesn't help Shotaro. His patient is in extreme pain. Shotaro's aunt asks Shirakawa to euthanize her nephew. Shirakawa carries out her wishes, but Shotaro's mother Yasuya, who did not care about her son, decides to sue Shirakawa. A divide over the legalization of euthanasia occurs.

Name: Kioku
cast_names: Nakai Kiichi,Yuka,Izumisawa Yuuki,Matsushita Yuki,Ishimaru Kenjiro,Kusamura Reiko
tag_names: Lawyer Male Lead,Alzheimer's Disease,Investigation
synopsis: Honjo Hidehisa a successful lawyer in his 50s, is found to have an early onset of Alzheimer혪s. He forgets memories which he ought to remember and constantly recalls those that he wants to forget. One incident he wishes to forget is the death of his son in a car accident. The culprit still has not been caught. Honjo has not faced up to the past until now. He has only thought of work and neglected his new family. But as he gradually begins to lose his memories, he devotes his remaining life to exposing his past and taking on his final case.

Name: That Whistling by Youth
cast_names: Mars Li,Cui Hang,Liao Yu Chen,Chen Mei Lin,Liu Shi Tong,Dong Si Yi
tag_names: Conspiracy,Adapted From A Novel,Cross-Dressing,Investigation,School,Friendship
synopsis: Yang Yi is a free-spirited girl who's homeschooled by her father, who raised her on his own after her mother passed. He homeschooled her while allowing her cousin, who is her best friend, to attend his school (He's the headmaster), out of fear of his daughter being ill-influenced, or harmed. On her birthday, Yang Yi finds her friend Ye Qing washed up on the beach, and brings her to the ER, only to find out she's in a coma. She then transfers to the all girls school as a boy to find out what brought her friend to suicide.

Name: Faith Makes Great
screenwriter: Liang Zhen Hua,  Chu Zheng,  Hsuan Chen,  Qin Wen
cast_names: Wang Kai,Neo Hou,Zhang Xue Ying,Tan Song Yun,Lu Yi,Zhang Jing Yi
tag_names: Biographical,Multiple Mains,Chinese Communist Party,Propaganda
synopsis:
One hundred years since the founding of the Communist Party of China, Faith Makes Great tells stories from different times in history that chronicle the people's endless struggle to realize their dream of rejuvenating the nation. 

The key themes are as follows:
"Ice and Fire": Shougang workers shift operations towards ice-surfacing for the Winter Olympics
 "173 meters": Lanyu Railway Construction
"Rock Sugar": The story of Deng Jia, the chief commander of atomic bomb theory design
"The Next Hundred Years": Restoration of the Forbidden City cultural relics
"Family": Medical Aid Team
"Button": the first small private business
"Time Train": High-speed rail construction
 "Your Eyes": Protecting the Yunnan Golden Monkey

Name: Kodoku no Gurume Season 3
cast_names: Matsushige Yutaka,Katsukura Keiko,Hirota L챕ona,Shimizu Michiko,Ishikura Saburo,Ameku Michiko
tag_names: Adapted From A Manga
synopsis: The drama will continue in the exact same style as the previous two seasons and feature more sweets and light meals that made the second season so popular. Kusumi himself will also be appearing in a short segment at the end of the drama to give viewers more information. ~~ Based on Kusumi Masayuki and Taniguchi Jiro's manga of the same name.

Name: Psycho Doctor
cast_names: Takenouchi Yutaka,Hada Michiko,Ichikawa Mikako,Kamiki Ryunosuke,Watanabe Misako,Akiyama Natsuko
tag_names: Acrophobia,Phobia,Investigation
synopsis: Are you afraid of heights? Why? Is it just acrophobia? Or, perhaps as a very young child you witnessed the murder of your father as he was pushed off the veranda of your apartment building and now have a deathly fear of going up to the 20th floor of any building! Psychoanalyst and counselor Kyosuke Kai, a bit quirky with compulsions of his own, ends up finding out more than just the standard medical reasons for his patient's emotional problems. So, rather than just practice counseling, Dr. Kai becomes in effect a detective as well. Join Dr. Kai and examine his case files to learn more about his patients and what makes them tick... or crack.

Name: Living Toward the Sun
cast_names: Jiang Xin,Gao Wei Guang,Ning Dan Lin,Gao Xu Yang,Viola Mi,Fu Tian Jiao
tag_names: Terminal Illness,Cancer,Based On True Story,Inspired By Real Person,Doctor Male Lead,Carefree Female Lead,Misfortune,Author,Strong Female Lead
synopsis:
It is based on the story of young cartoonist Xiong Dun who encounters double setbacks in love and the workplace. In the face of adversity, she bravely fights her illness and spreads positivity with her infectious smile.
Xiang Yang is a carefree young woman who comes to Beijing to fulfil her dreams of becoming a manhua artist. After persuading her family and finally finding a job and a house, Xiong Dun settles down in Beijing. Life may be hard but Xiang Yang is surrounded by people that she loves.
Unfortunately, life does not treat her kindly. Xiang Yang's boyfriend cheats on her and she experiences a setback in her career. Misfortunes come in threes as she starts to get sick. When her childhood friend forces her to go to the hospital for an examination, Xiang Yang learns that she has a tumor. From being unwilling and unable to accept her circumstances, Xiang Yang gradually finds the strength to live her life to the fullest.

Name: Manpuku
director: Adachi Mojiri,  Hosaka Keita,  Watanabe Yoshio
cast_names: Ando Sakura,Hasegawa Hiroki,Matsuzaka Keiko,Uchida Yuki,Otani Ryohei,Matsushita Nao
tag_names: Showa Era,Asadora,Slice Of Life,Based On True Story,Family,World War 2,Older Man/Younger Woman,War,Drama,Age Gap [Drama Life]
synopsis:
The 99th Asadora follows the life of Tachibana Fukuko, a young woman who tries to survive tough times in Osaka with her husband from before WWII to the rapid economic development era. Together they overcome various setbacks before they succeed in creating instant noodles.

~~ Based on the true story of the wife of Ando Momofuku, the businessman who founded Nissin Food Products Co. Ltd. and the inventor of instant ramen.

Name: Aibou: Season 19
director: Hashimoto Hajime,  Gonno Hajime,  Sugiyama Taiichi
screenwriter: Yamamoto Mutsumi,  Koshimizu Yasuhiro,  Takimoto Tomoyuki
cast_names: Mizutani Yutaka,Sorimachi Takashi,Moriguchi Yoko,Kawahara Kazuhisa,Nakama Yukie,Yamanishi Atsushi
tag_names: Investigation,Detective,Suspense
synopsis: Inspector Sugishita Ukyo from the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department혪s Special Missions Unit makes brilliant deductions and cracks difficult cases with his partner Kaburagi Wataru who used to be a career bureaucrat from the Ministry of Justice.

Name: Krong Karm
director: Au Tanakorn Posayanon,  Off Pongpat Wachirabunjong
cast_names: Mai Charoenpura,Bella Ranee Campen,James Jirayu Tangsrisuk,Phet Thakrit Tawanpong,Preeyakarn Jaikanta,Richy Oranate D.caballes
tag_names: Lung Cancer,First Generation Immigrants,Mother-in-law-Daughter-in-law Relationship,Death Of A Son,Death Of A Mother,Generational Conflict,Death Of Father,Karma,Single Mother,Car Accident
synopsis:
Yoi is the mother in a Thai-Chinese family, she has four sons. Her eldest Achai comes from the army bringing a pregnant prostitute Reynu as his wife even though he already has a fiancee Philai. Yoi can't accept this and tries every possible way to to make him leave Reynu but fails, unknown to her that Reynu has performed black magic to tie her son's heart. She decided to marry her second son Atong to Philai to avoid shame even though he likes a worker named Janta and decides to also give Atong the house and store she was supposed to give to her eldest.
Her third son Asa is the kindest. He is handsome, smart and charming. When Yoi finds out he has feelings for Janta she worries he will do like his eldest brother and decides to marry him off into a rich family, unknown to her that the family is tricking him into marrying their already pregnant daughter to avoid shame.
The fourth son Asee is still a student. He is spoiled, playful and doesn't assume responsibility for his actions. He becomes charmed by Reynu's sister when he meets her and tries desperately to court her.

~~ Adapted from a novel of the same title by author Chulamani.

Name: The Story of Zhen Guan
cast_names: Tang Guo Qiang,Nie Yuan,Chen Bao Guo,Zhang Tie Lin,Du Zhi Guo,Wang Hui Chun
tag_names: Emperor Taizong Of Tang,Tang Dynasty
synopsis: After the showdown at Xuan Wu Gate against his brothers Li Jian Cheng and Li Yuan Ji, Li Shi Min officially became the second Tang dynasty emperor, establishing the era name Zhen Guan. Although not without challenges and internal conflicts, his reign brought much needed peace and prosperity to the country and its people.

Name: Kodoku no Gurume Season 5
cast_names: Matsushige Yutaka,Kin Takao,Ishii Kenichi,Terada Minori,Nishio Mari,Asano Atsuko
tag_names: Adapted From A Manga
synopsis: Inogashira Goro, who runs an imported general merchandise business, enjoys eating on his own and would visit dining establishments when there are intervals of free time during work.

Name: Without You

synopsis: The story revolves on the lives of two former childhood friend turned lovers whose destinies pave way through their marriage and try to pave their way of difficult lives as Overseas Filipino Worker (OFW) just to provide for them a better life as a married couple and as a family.

Name: New Generation: Because I Have a Home
cast_names: Tan Song Yun,Bai Jing Ting,Wei Qing,Fan Shi Qi,Shao Feng,Wang Yi Sheng
tag_names: Live Streamer,E-commerce,Graduate,University,Village,Student,Character Development,Love/Hate Relationship,First Love
