Name: 853: Detective Kamo Shinnosuke
cast_names: Terawaki Yasufumi,Tomita Yasuko,Tanabe Seiichi,Kaneda Akio,Sugawara Daikichi,Totsugi Shigeyuki
tag_names: Investigation,Miniseries,Detective

Name: Ching Chang
cast_names: Captain Phutanate Hongmanop,Pepper Ratthasart Korrasud,Jeab Sopitnapa Chumpanee,Pimmada Boriruksuppakorn,Ann Alicia Laisuthruklai,Pang Ornjira Larmwilai
tag_names: Obsession,Adapted From A Novel,Jealousy,Multiple Couples,Multi-Generational,Sisterhood,Black Magic
synopsis:
Ching Chang, meaning Hate, is a  multi-generational story about the love affairs of four sisters, Im, Oon, Bang Orn and Aree.  Although the daughters of the strict Village Chief Kaew,  greed, jealousy and infatuations have them constantly competing and bickering.  
Im, the eldest, is gentle and beautiful; naturally, she draws the attention of eligible bachelors.  She is the love of Yod, the village hoodlum, who would do anything to have her; but, he has to compete for her with the wealthy and respectable In. 
Meanwhile, Oon is in love with Yod and Bang Orn wants In; they each scheme, separately, to get their man by getting Im out of the way.
In despair, Yod resorts to black magic to make Im fall in love with him.  They run away together, the day before Im is to marry In. 
 Furious, In then swears that he will pour his entire life into getting revenge against Yod and getting Im back.
Hate, love, obsession, and passion set in motion the scheming that will reign havoc over the lives of the four sisters and the men who love them.  Not only they, but their children will also have to deal w/ the bad karma created.

Name: Kirin ga Kuru
cast_names: Hasegawa Hiroki,Motoki Masahiro,Sometani Shota,Kawaguchi Haruna,Kazama Shunsuke,Kimura Fumino
tag_names: Taiga,Sengoku Period,Samurai
synopsis: After the Onin War, the world is plunged into chaos. Amid this situation, heroes of the warring states begin to emerge in an attempt to unify the country and rule in these turbulent times. In the mid-1540s, there is a young wandering samurai in Mino which is strategically located between the East and West. His name is Akechi Mitsuhide. At this time, there is plenty of internal strife within the Toki clan which rules Mino. Surrounded by the Oda of Owari, the Imagawa of Suruga and the Asakura of Echizen, Mino has constantly faced the risk of invasion. Mitsuhide is pulled into battle and destroys the enemy. His bravery as well as stratagem catches the attention of Saito Toshimasa, the chief retainer of the Toki clan, and he is singled out. This man who is also known as Saito Dosan will go on to takeover the Toki and make Mino his own.

Name: Day and Night
cast_names: Liang Yuan,Wang Long Zheng,Pan Yue Ming,Lu Hao,Sun Le Tian,Wu William
tag_names: Dark Fiction,Policeman,Nyctophobia,Wrongfully Accused,Death,Brothers,Phobia,Identity Swap,Twins,Murder
synopsis: The usually carefree Guan Hong Yu gets accused of having murdered a whole family. To clear his younger twin brother혪s charge, the team leader of the criminal investigation department Guan Hong Feng wants to take on this case, but since he혪s a relative, he혪s not allowed to participate in the investigation. A new team leader named Zhou Xun is assigned and ends up seeking Hong Feng혪s help. Zhou Xun and Hong Feng as his 혫consultant혬 uncover a number of cases together. However, Hong Feng has a secret: one of the twin brothers has fear of the dark phobia, so the 혫Hong Feng혬 appearing at the police station during the day and at night is actually not the same person. Together, the twins secretly try to find out the truth about the 혫family extinction murder case혬.

Name: Madoromi Barmaid
cast_names: Yagi Arisa,Hyunri,Kiryuu Mai,Aijima  Kazuyuki,Shimizu Hazuki,Oshinari Shugo
tag_names: Bartender,Adapted From A Manga
synopsis: Story about a female bartender and her special "my-pace" bar where she makes cocktails that leave unforgettable taste in her customers' hearts.

Name: On the Prairie
cast_names: Chae Jung An,Chae Rim,Choi Soo Jong,Choi Chul Ho,Jung Dong Hwan,Youn Yuh Jung
tag_names: Doctor Female Lead,Secondary Couple,Rich Female Lead,Older Man/Younger Woman,Opposites Attract,Brothers,Rich Woman/Poor Man,Tomboy,Nice Male Lead,Unrequited Love
synopsis:
Genuine love between a full-hearted man and a tomboy princess, a touching story about a humorous and warm love. 
Cha Tae Woong is a car salesman. He is optimistic, candid and has strong conviction.
He can endure a disadvantage but not injustice. He has strong will and bravery to face things head on and not compromise justice. He also has his own principle in sales and sticks to it at all costs. This inflicts loss many times, but he believes that momentary gain is less important than his conviction.
Seong Yeon Ho is a pediatrician. She's an only child of an affluent family and is the hope of the family. With sophisticated looks, she is a self-centered person but also bright. She is an arrogant girl who refuses to be meddled with and does whatever she wants. However, because of forgetfulness and a restless personality, she's a cute and warm-hearted girl who is truthful.
This is the story of a man, who has nothing to show except for siblings and true courage, and a woman, who has never experienced failure and who has only cared for herself inside a plentiful enclosure, who find the true meaning of life and who become mature through the process of meeting and falling in love.

Name: Keishicho Shissonin Sosaka
cast_names: Sawamura Ikki,Kohinata Fumiyo,Endo Kenichi,Moriya Kanna,Kitamura Yukiya,Kikawada Masaya
tag_names: Investigation,Detective,Adapted From A Novel,Miniseries
synopsis:
Takashiro Kengo is a former police detective of the Metropolitan Police's 1st Investigation Division. Since his daughter disappeared, Kengo's attitude has changed and he normally disregards caution. Now, Kengo works in the Metropolitan Police Missing Person Investigation Section with partner Myojin Megumi.

~~ Adapted from novel series "Keishich? Shiss?ka Takashiro Kengo" by D?ba Shunichi.

Name: Teppan
screenwriter: Seki Erika,  Imai Masako,  Terada Toshio
cast_names: Takimoto Miori,Yasuda Narumi,Endo Kenichi,Morita Naoyuki,Omi Toshinori,Kashiwabara Shuji
tag_names: Restaurant,Asadora,Short Length Series,Okonomiyaki,Drama
synopsis: Akari's birth mother is originally from Osaka. She moves to Osaka to live with her grandmother to learn more about her mother. She learns that her grandmother closed the okonomiyaki (a Japanese savory pancake) restaurant after Akari's teenage mother had ran away. Akari then re-opens the okonomiyaki restaurant and tries to start the business on her own.

Name: U Motherbaker
cast_names: Zhong Xin Ling,Huang Pei Jia,Joe Zhang,Darren Chiu,Sam Wang,Johnny Yang
tag_names: Traditional Cake Shop,Widow,Family Relationship,Sibling
synopsis: A Taiwanese family comedy that reflect the daily culture of the people and also the problem of the transformation of a traditional cake shop. It discusses parent-child relationship, problems between mother in law and wife, the gap between generations and the dilema of maintaining tradition or modernization.

Name: The Debut
cast_names: Ploypailin Thangprapaporn,Kao Jirayu La-ongmanee,Best Nathasit Kotimanuswanich,Film Rachanun Mahawan,Cherreen Nachjaree Horvejkul,Meiko Chonnikan Netjui
tag_names: Entertainment Industry,Revenge,Investigation,Workplace Abuse,Hidden Identity,Jealousy,Suicide,Hidden Relationship,Hidden Personality,Idol
synopsis:
The death of one of the Newtype members leads to a quest to find the reason behind it from its 6 members Yok, Smile, Yui, Kirin, Minnie, and Minor.

Fame decides to audition for the famous idol group "Newtype" to find the truth about the death of her sister Farn, a former member of the group. She need to change herself from a rock girl to fit into Newtype, with the help of Kla. Her investigation led her to witness that many members of the group have violated their own rules. This entire experience also created a conflict with her rocker boyfriend Ble, who does not like the fact that they are in a secret relationship

What will Fame do? And what will she choose between her relationship and finding out the truth?

Name: Shao Nian Huang Fei Hong
cast_names: Ashton Chen,He Zhong Hua,Hao Lei,Lu Li Ping,Liu Pei Qi,Wang Zheng Quan
synopsis: The series follows the teenage days of the young Huang Fei Hong As a teenager, Huang Fei Hong is known throughout Guangzhou for his martial arts prowess - and his mischief. His troublemaking abilities are matched only by his mother, bringing a great many headaches for respected father Huang Qi Ying. Fei Hong is forced to face the trials of adulthood, however, when his mother passes away in a suspicious fire, and calamity befalls the Huang family.

Name: Crossroad Bistro
cast_names: Wang  Luo Dan,Lan Ying Ying,Gina Jin,Nina Chuo,Drolma Suijun,Han Geng
tag_names: Female Centered Plot,Multiple Mains,Multiple Couples,Materialistic Female Lead,Chinese Restaurant,Ex-Boyfriend Comes Back,Actress,Best Friends,Second Chance Romance,Chef
synopsis:
About five women who opened up a restaurant named Bei Zhe Nan Yuan in Beijing; and in the process they mature and attain love. As the biggest shareholder of their restaurant, You Shan Shan single-handedly brought her best girlfriends together. Bao Xue, an optimistic little-known actress, and Dai Xiao Yu who returned from overseas are cousins. Upon their reunion, they settle into a daily life filled with endless banter. The remaining two shareholders are not to be underestimated. Si Meng is a housewife while Feng Xi went to Beijing for the sake of love.

(Source : Chinesedrama.info)

Name: Love of My Life
cast_names: Coney Reyes,Carla Abellana,Mikael Daez,Rhian Ramos,Vaness del Moral-Kier,Samantha Lopez
tag_names: Terminal Illness,Rich Man/Poor Woman
synopsis:
The Gonzales family is not like any other, Isabella, the matriarch, is a rich widow with high standards who would stop at nothing to get what's best for her family. Nikolai, her youngest son, has grown into a rebellious man after causing a traumatic family accident which led to the death of his father. Stefano, the favorite son, is a family-oriented architect who fathers the child of Kelly, his former lover who holds a vengeful heart due to what she has been through in the name of love. 

When Stefano crosses paths with Adelle, a widow with a child who manages her own handicraft business, things begin to get better. Amidst Isabella's objection towards their relationship, Stefano and Adelle strive to build a normal family. 

Their seemingly perfect life crumbles not only when Kelly barges into the picture along with the estranged Nikolai, but also when Stefano gets diagnosed with a terminal illness. How can pain bring together such opposing characters for the sake of the love of their lives? How will Adelle, Kelly, Nikolai, and Isabella adapt to their unusual set-up, living inside one house for the sickly Stefano?

Name: Last Friend
cast_names: Shen Si Ji,He De Rui,Nate Gong,Wu Rui Song,Jiang Yu Wei,Qi Yun Peng
tag_names: Multiple Mains
synopsis:
A touching story that follows a group of young people born after 1995 pursuing their love for music.
Qin Yi and Zhong Yi are best buddies with opposite personalities. Qin Yi is tameless and easygoing. Zhong Yi is disciplined and prideful. The two join a singing competition together but Zhong Yi suddenly decides to withdraw. Qin Yi and the band lose their chance at winning championship and part ways.
Due to their shared love love for music, Zhong Yi and his roommates Coco, Yin Long and the tomboyish Wu Jin come together to form a band. During practice, Zhong Yi accidentally discovers a secret about Qin Yi. It turns out that Qin Yi had a heart transplant in the past and the donor was none other than his older brother who died from a car accident. Will he be able to cope with the truth so that they can stand onstage again?

Name: La Vida Lena Season 3
cast_names: Erich Gonzales,Carlo Aquino,JC de Vera,Kit Thompson,Sofia Andres,Janice de Belen
tag_names: Workplace Abuse,Hardworking Female Lead,Soap Opera,Discrimination,Plastic Surgery,Makeover,Business

Name: LUV U: Season 1
cast_names: Miles Ocampo,Kiray,Marco Gumabao,Angeli Gonzales,CJ Navato,Karen Reyes
tag_names: University,Student
synopsis: Lessons in love through the eyes of six teen students of Lambertu Uy Villarama University or LUV U as they experience the highs and lows of being in love at a very young age.

Name: Tokai no Tomu & Soya Bokura no Toride
cast_names: Jyo Kairi,Sakai Taichi,Toyoshima Hana,Watanabe Miyu,Yoshihara Raichi,Yamashita Shiira
tag_names: Secret Crush,Best Friends,Slight Romance,Junior High School,Dream,Smart Male Lead,Miniseries,Student,Nice Male Lead,Rich Male Lead
synopsis: One day, the legendary game creator Eita Kurii announced a new game that only those who solved the mystery can play. The two boys Naito and Ryuo take up the challenge to solve the mystery.

Name: Make It With You
director: Cathy Garcia Molina,  Theodore Boborol,  Mae Cruz-Alviar
cast_names: Enrique Gil,Liza Soberano,Ian Veneracion,Pokwang,Ina Raymundo,Khalil  Ramos
tag_names: Homeless,Baker,Family Relationship,Infidelity,Enemies To Lovers,Con Artist,Love Square,Fate,Cooking,Filmed Abroad
synopsis: Two different individuals who, despite having different priorities in life, found love in each other. But after series of encounter, they will have to decide whether it's a love worth choosing.

Name: Saying Goodbye
cast_names: Andrea Brillantes,Seth Fedelin,Andi Abaya,Kobie Brown,Sunshine Dizon,Dominic Ochoa
tag_names: Heart Transplant,Heart Disease,Miniseries,Friends To Lovers,Terminal Illness,Music
synopsis: Saying Goodbye is a story about celebrating life despite all the challenges life throws at us. Is their love for each other too late? Are they ready to love knowing they will also have to say goodbye forever?

Name: The Making of An Ordinary Woman
cast_names: Ying Shiuan Hsieh,James Wen,Bella Wu,Wayne Song,Lan Wei Hua,Chen Chia Kuei
tag_names: Past And Present,LGBTQ+,Miniseries,Childhood Friends,Adapted From A Novel,Gay Character
synopsis: 39-year-old Chen Chia Lin doesn혪t have a car, an apartment or a husband-- and she just lost her job. Born in southern Taiwan during Taiwan혪s economic takeoff, Chen was raised by her parents and grandparents to be a straight-A student and respectable lady. But Chen knew in her heart that her dreams would not blossom in her hometown, and after a rebellion in the family, she left home to study in Taipei. After 20 years trying to establish herself in the city and 혩living by the rules혪, Chen now swears on to live her life as an unapologetically confident woman.

Name: The Making of an Ordinary Woman 2
cast_names: Ying Shiuan Hsieh,Lan Wei Hua,Chen Chu Sheng,Sara Yu,Yang Li Yin,Joseph Hsia
tag_names: Gay Romance,Midlife Crisis,LGBTQ+,Miniseries,Character Development,Gay Character
synopsis:
Chia Ling is ready for life after 40! A stable relationship, a career change, love and support from her family and finally getting her own house, what혪s not to like about 40? Just when she ventures into this new stage of womanhood, she was told by her doctor that she is showing signs of early menopause. As the clock is ticking, she feels more pressured to figure out what she wants for her life. Yet, she is not the only one! Her father혪s health is slowly deteriorating. Realizing time is not on his side, her father reconnects with his first love again, leaving Chia Ling혪s mother upset and furious.

As Chia Ling juggles between work and relationship, she must also deal with her peculiar family as her unfaithful father, self-pitying mother, confused brother, and even her hapless cousin in Taipei, are all fighting for her attention. Yet, none of these come close to the abrupt surprise waiting around the corner: an innocent, unblemished life that will change Chia Ling혪s life on a catastrophic level.

Name: The Bad Dad
cast_names: Takahashi Katsunori,Koizumi Kotaro,Kuninaka Ryoko,Nishimaru Yuko,Kato Cha,Omi Toshinori
tag_names: Miniseries
synopsis: With three kids and a wife, Atsushi Yajima should be going home right after work to help around the house and spend time with the kids. Instead, he goes out with his friends and flirts with other women. All this changes when Atsushi's wife passes away suddenly and he is forced to assume the role of dad, with all the responsibilities that come with being a single parent. Can he do it? Or will he end up passing the responsibilities on to someone else?

Name: Satsui no Michinori
cast_names: Iura Arata,Bakarhythm,Hotta Mayu,Sakuma Yui,Tsurumi Shingo,Asuka Rin
tag_names: Revenge,Murder,Suicide,Bankruptcy,Black Comedy,Death,Eccentric Male Lead,Suspense
synopsis: Due to heavy debts incurred by CEO Yushiyuki, the owner of a small cardboard processing company was forced into bankruptcy and driven to suicide. Despite pleas from the man's family, Yoshiyuki remained unpunished by the law. Blocked by the usual legal channels, the son, Kubota Kazuma, and his cousin vow to kill the man responsible for his death. However, given that neither of them has ever killed someone, it requires a lot of planning and a lot of help to achieve the perfect crime.

Name: Unknown Number
cast_names: Du Chun,Li Xiao Ran,Wang Tian Chen,Michael Mao,Han Ye Zhou,Wang Xin
tag_names: Detective Male Lead,Detective Female Lead,Police Department,Time Rift,Smart Female Lead,Smart Male Lead,Criminal Profiler,Strong Female Lead,Murder,Serial Killer
synopsis: The story follows He Jun, a hard-working detective who meets a young and passionate criminal profiler named Gu Ming Zhe. Gu Ming Zhe's life begins to change when he unexpectedly finds a mysterious old phone that connects him to a certain Cao Zheng, a clumsy yet resolute detective who unbeknownst to Gu Ming Zhe, has been missing for 20 years and is calling from the year 1998. The team then takes on the task of resolving impossible cold cases.

Name: Fuujinshi
cast_names: Saotome Taichi,Endo Yuya,Nakamura  Yurika,Fukagawa Mai,Tezuka Toru,Hashimoto Jun
tag_names: Investigation
synopsis:
Osagami Kakeru is a master who is tasked with the mission of sealing the blades of filth called Kegareyaiba born from the dark sides of people's hearts.

(News Yahoo)

Name: 3 nen B gumi Kinpachi Sensei 7
cast_names: Takeda Tetsuya,Yabu Kota,Yaotome Hikaru,Fukuda Saki,Tomiura Satoshi,Ayukawa Taiyo
tag_names: Teacher,Middle School,School,Friendship
synopsis:
This series is back in its 25th year with the seventh season. What concerns and problems with this new class will Kimpachi Sakamoto (Takeda Tetsuya) confront? Yet again, through the days and months of the year, we will learn lessons that money can't buy.

In the sixth series, Sakamoto was in heated disagreement with Principal Chida over teaching methods. So much so that he was ordered off the Board of Education. But he is back teaching at Sakura Middle School. Recently there has been a spate of young crime. Even Sakura has to deal with new problems like drugs and sexually transmitted diseases. Kimpachi returns to a school system in tumult. What problems will he confront and what message will he have for us? Keep an eye on class 3B over the next six months.

Name: Got to Believe
cast_names: Daniel Padilla,Kathryn Bernardo,Liza Soberano,Joy Viado,Manuel Chua,Jon Lucas
synopsis:
As young Chichay unexpectedly met young Joaquin in their family-owned amusement fair, she taught him to believe that magic exists. However, their friendship abruptly ended as Chichay's family moved to the province while Joaquin had an almost-fatal accident which prevented him from living a normal life. Ten years later, they have literally bumped into each other but never had any idea about their childhood past.
In spite of living a comfortable and wealthy life, teenage Joaquin feels he is different due to his brain injury. His overprotective mother, Juliana, unknowingly hired teenage Chichay as his nanny. The two that had started off having an unpleasant relationship with each other eventually became friends. As they found comfort in each other's company, they learned various lessons in life such as the true meaning of friendship, of standing by your family, and of accepting one혪s self. While their feelings blossomed into love, things also got complicated and had put them to the test as they encountered numerous conflicts like their parents' past, their economic gap and the cause of Joaquin's accident when he was still a kid.

Name: Forward
cast_names: Namcha Sheranut Yusananda,Sean Jindachot,Oak Smith Arayaskul,Push Puttichai Kasetsin,Nicky Nachat Juntapun,Kun Kunchanuj Kengkarnka
tag_names: Special Power,Time Altering
synopsis: The story of four ordinary boys who are born to find a way to open a doorway through time. With this ability, they can see into the future and discover how to solve problems and how the future will unfold. They come together and choose to take on the roles of Time Heroes, where they will solve problems for people and change the future for those who ask혰 these events range from family affairs all the way to national incidents. Problems and chaos begins to grow as certain futures are not fixed, or even unable to be seen.

Name: More Than Love
cast_names: Bea Alonzo,John Lloyd Cruz,Anne Curtis,Sam Milby,Christopher de Leon,Chin Chin Gutierrez
tag_names: Infidelity
synopsis: A soap opera that tackles intricate filial relationships among the elite and the poor and how the social economic classes respond to each other, longing for love and justice, Maging Sino Ka Man revolves around the lives of four main characters (Eli, Jackie, Celine, and JB) who each are searching for purpose, freedom, and happiness. The soap has been praised both by audiences and critics for its excellent storyline and powerhouse acting. It was tagged as phenomenal and was widely talked about online. Recurring subplots include a father's masochistic attitude as a result of his hatred toward his deceased mother, an unfaithful wife who redeems herself as a mother, a business tycoon who gives heavy importance to power and creating the "perfect son," a son's submission to his overpowering mother, a young woman's struggles to move beyond her pain, a brother's guilt over a crime and a man's vengeful transformation due to the death of his foster father.

Name: Iryu Team Medical Dragon  4
director: Tanaka Ryo,  Moriwaki Tomonobu,  Mizuta Naruhide
cast_names: Sakaguchi Kenji,Inamori Izumi,Koike Teppei,Abe Sadao,Sasaki Kuranosuke,Natsuki Mari
tag_names: Adapted From A Manga
synopsis: Big corporations and trading companies are buying out hospitals overseas or are building new hospitals to get into foreign countries in an attempt to earn foreign money through healthcare for wealthy individuals. On the other hand in Japan, the administration of mid-sized hospitals which shoulder medical treatment for the rural areas is badly off. This is compounded by the shortage of doctors. The successive closure of the most essential hospitals to patients make many people anxious. Amidst this harsh reality, Asada Ryutaro and Team Dragon regroup in order to create the ideal hospital and get into action. But there are numerous obstacles that stand in their way including the business consultant Okamura Tadashi. Okamura has been chosen one of the world혪s 100 influential businessmen in connection to the many hospitals he has reorganised in the US. He has teamed up with Noguchi Takeo to try to promote a project which will provide high quality Japanese medical treatment to India. Japanese doctors are key for him to penetrate the market and he wants to recruit Team Dragon. However, they are not moved by money or prestige. So he tries all sorts of measures in an attempt to win them over.

Name: Operation: Special Warfare
cast_names: Gao Wei Guang,Hu Bing Qing,Li Chuan,Xu Shi Yue,Chi Ning Ning,Ding Jia Wen
tag_names: Army Officer,Strong Female Lead,Covert Operation,Age Gap [Drama Life],Age Gap [Real Life],Cheerful Female Lead,Brave Main Lead,Warm Female Lead,Captain,Strong Male Lead
synopsis:
In order to defeat the latest in terrorist factions, a very elite unit is created of 14 of the most skilled young military personnel from around the country. The team is called "Blue Lightning Commandos" and are led by Captain Qin Guan, a no nonsense, tough-as-nails leader with a much softer interior and good heart. Though he doesn't show it all the time, he cares very much about his team and wants them to become the best of the best. He trains them hard, but with a focus on safety and learning to trust each other. 

Ning Meng is a super focused soldier who lost her brother in a terrorist attack, and joined to honor his memory and prove to everyone around her that she could be an elite just like him. Though she and Qin Guan butt heads in the beginning, with time and effort she gains his trust and the respect of her comrades-in-arms. Together they go through thick and thin, while playing cat and mouse with a group of terrorists hellbent on executing a horrible plan. In the midst of all of this, Qin Guan and Ning Meng find something totally unexpected on a battlefield- love.

Name: Sana Dalawa ang Puso
cast_names: Robin Padilla,Richard Yap,Jodi Sta. Maria,Patrick Garcia,Boboy Garovillo,Miles Ocampo
synopsis:
Sana Dalawa ang Puso follows the story of Mona Bulalayao and Lisa Laureano (both played by Jodi Sta. Maria), two different women with identical faces; both facing challenging ordeals in their lives.

Lisa is a strict and hardworking boss in the Laureano Group of Companies, her family혪s business. Her world suddenly turns upside down when her father, Juancho Laureano, betroths her to their rival혪s son, Martin Co. In avoid the arranged marriage, she hides with one of her workers, Leo Tabayoyong.

Her look-alike Mona, on the other hand, works as a bet collector in cockfights and is struggling to save her father, Ramon Bulalayao, from peril after the latter gets involved in a networking scam.

What will happen when the two cross paths? Will they be able to solve each other혪s problems?

synopsis:
Fujiko is a rare bloodthirsty serial killer. The only survivor of a brutal murder that killed her whole family when she was 11 years old, she suffered massive trauma. Before she is aware of it, she has become a bloodthirsty killer who only pursues happiness. But her life starts to derail 혯 혫I can reset my life,혬 she would mutter as she kills over and over again. Why does she murder?

~~ Adapted from the novel "Satsujinki Fujiko No Shoudou" by Mari Yukiko.

Name: Flip in Summer
cast_names: Dai Xiang Yu,Li Mao,Kris Shen,Luo Yun Xi,Cai Guo Long,Wu Yu Tong
tag_names: Diving,Love Triangle
synopsis:
To help its students become physically fit, Qingye University has decided to create a diving team with the intention to strive for the nationals. This is a story about young men and women who are part of the school diving team.

The cold and prideful Xia Wen Xi signs up for the team together with the wild and unruly diving prodigy Xiu Ye. The two boys clash immediately to create a terse relationship. Tao Le Si who comes from a poor family but has a bright and bubbly personality also joins the team. When Xia Wenxi's good friend Gao Gong Ping starts paying attention to Tao Le Si and Xia Wen Xi discovers that he also likes Tao Le Si, the love triangle becomes increasingly complicated as Sen Nai Yi also gets in the picture, all while the team undergoes rigorous training to prepare for competition.

synopsis: To take care of the increasingly-rampant international drug trafficking organizations, a joint team was formed. Suspicions and betrayals surround both parties, and among the key players are a gangster with multiple identities and a war prisoner.

cast_names: Nhing Nirut Sirijanya,Gee Sutthirak Subvijitra,Pim Latkamon Pinrojkirati,Krit Shahkrit Yamnam,Praew Hassaya Isereekul
tag_names: Grief,Flashback To Past,Parkinson's Disease,Widower,Jobless,Neighbors,Miniseries,Unusual Friendship,Loneliness,Character Development
synopsis:
The story between "Wichai", an old man who is desperate for life, and "JJ", a young man searching for a purpose in life. What will the conclusion of the couple be?

'JJ' was terminated by his girlfriend. The two quarreled so loudly that 'Wichai' the old man next to the house. That lives without purpose Upset with annoyance And the event becomes even harder When Wichai saw JJ secretly stole his mango until it reached the police station. Police mediate JJ to water the plants for Wichai every day as a punishment. The beginning of friendship of different ages was born.

Name: Bureau of Transformer
screenwriter: Wang Huan,  Zhang Chen Zi,  Tiao Tiao,  Zhang Zhen,  Guo Yi Wen,  Zhang Lu

synopsis: Hao Yun, a vet at a private clinic, leads a mundane life until he accidentally discovers the world is inhabited by monsters. Worried about the secret of their existence leaking, monsters capture Hao Yun and attempt to erase his memories. When their attempts fail, Hao Yun is forced to join Monsters Bureau, where he solves cases involving monsters with the help of his new partner, Wu Aiai. As Hao Yun dives deeper into this new world, he learns that even monsters must deal with the mundane struggles of everyday life and the entanglements created by human emotion.

cast_names: Ryan Zhu,Xing Fei,James Yang,Kiwi Shang,Huang Qian Shuo,Judy Qi

The body of the hidden dragon spirit of the small Lang Yang Yi because of the plague incident involved in the Shanghai forces wave cloud treacherous battle, and thus met the Mayor of Shanghai Mayor Mo Xiaoyu, and with love. Behind the scenes, but also the identity of Yang Yi Shi Shou as the same, because of its crazy pursuit of "longevity" delusion, at the artificial spread of the plague, to man-made medicinal herbs refining profits, and then more assassinated politicians, Fang warlord contradictions induced war, the ultimate goal is to achieve the manufacture of "six scourge", the blood sacrifices in exchange for personal survival of the evil target.

Name: Ikaw Lamang

In this world a forbidden friendship will bloom between the children of sakadas-- a plantation worker, Samuel, and a haciendera, Isabel. But in the end, their love, no matter how great, will not be enough. Will their true love triumph over time and circumstances?

Name: Hotarugusa
cast_names: Kiyohara Kaya,Machida Keita,Tanimura Mitsuki,Kitamura Yukiya,Ukaji Takashi,Takada Sho
tag_names: Hidden Identity,Strong Female Lead,Revenge,Adapted From A Novel,Samurai,Family,Nice Female Lead,Slight Romance,Edo Period,Miniseries
synopsis: Nana is a servant of the Kazahaya family, She is from a samurai family. Her father was about to reveal wrongdoings within the domain but had to commit ritual suicide for a crime he hadn't done. Ichinoshin tries to correct the wrongdoings, but end up being a target himself. After finding out her father's enemy is the man behind it all, Nana decides to protect Ichinoshin and his children, as she had promised Sachi, Ichinoshin's late wife.

Name: Dear Parents
cast_names: Yan Ni,Wang Yan Hui,Zhang Yi Jie,Zhai Xiao Wen,Li Chun Yuan,Flora Dai
tag_names: Loving Parents,Remarriage,Conflicts,Family Conflict,Family Relationship,Child Abuse,Sibling,Step Family
synopsis:
A story of a blended family follows Liu Bi Yun and Jiang Tian Huai who became husband and wife in their second marriage. Each with children of their own, they not only face outside challenges in their career but also have to handle family members with very different personalities. They return to the city after ten years of separation. Liu Bi Yun's stepdaughter Jiang Mei and grandma are the instigators of many conflicts within the family but Liu Bi Yun never takes it to heart as she tries to be a good mother and a good influence.

Although Jiang Lin and Li Bing are not biological brothers, they are always ready to help each other through difficulties. Jiang Xue is someone who's been hurt due to relationship problems but she manages to move on through the help of her family. She works hard to enter university and relies on gaining knowledge to change her destiny. Jiang Sen married early in the countryside and his wife Wang Gai Feng habitually disagrees with her mother-in-law.

 The mother and father of the family pour their love and devotion to ensure that their children can grow happily. As they enter the old age, the two look back to the past with no regrets. To be born as their sons and daughters is a fortunate thing.

Name: TV Novel: As the River Flows
cast_names: Kim Yoon Kyung,Kim Hyuk,Lee Pil Mo,Kyeon Mi Ri,Ban Hyo Jung,Kim Mi Sook
synopsis: Set in the late 1960s, this drama covers the story of two generations of three families, who go through turbulent times by loving, suffering, wandering, and failing due to entangled relationships that have their roots in their father's generation.

director: Taki Yusuke,  Yagi Takeshi,  Ninomiya Takashi

Name: Shitamachi Rocket
cast_names: Abe Hiroshi,Tsuchiya Tao,Maya Miki,Kikkawa Koji,Yasuda Ken,Yamazaki Ikusaburo

synopsis: Tsukuda Kohei was once a researcher with the Aerospace and Science Exploration Agency and now runs Tsukuda Industries, a small factory which was left by his father. Although his relationship with his teenage daughter Rina is somewhat strained, business at Tsukuda Industries has gradually started to improve. But Tsukuda puts too much effort into his dream of developing a rocket engine and business declines little by little. One day, a major client suddenly declares that it is dropping Tsukuda Industries. Then, Tsukuda Industries gets sued by a big rival company, Nakashima Industries, for patent infringement. Tsukuda Industries혪 reputation is hurt and financing from banks is also in a desperate situation. In the midst of this, Teikoku Heavy Industries, one of Japan혪s leading corporations, offers to buy a patent which Tsukuda Industries possesses for 2 billion yen

Name: FAKE MOTION: Yukemuri Onsen Takkyu Jikenbo

synopsis: One month after Ebisu Nagato Campus High School table tennis club challenged Satsukawa University Shibuya High School, both schools and Tokyo Metropolitan South Hachioji Technical High School make a hot spring trip to deepen friendship.

Name: Boku no Tsuma to Kekkon Shite Kudasai

synopsis: 45-year-old Mimura Shuji is a man who loves making people laugh more than anything else. A staff of a TV station, he has lived a life dedicated to directing variety programmes. He was recently transferred from programme production to sales. Even so, he works with a smile every day. But one day, Mimura is summoned by the hospital where he had undergone a comprehensive medical examination. He is suddenly diagnosed with pancreatic cancer and is given six months to live. He hides his illness from his wife, Ayako, and puts on a brave face. However, he wonders what a very ordinary salaryman like himself with not much savings and a housing loan can do so that Ayako and their son will keep on smiling. He hits upon the idea of searching for someone who can safeguard his own family on his behalf. Gambling all that he has left of his life, he starts this absurd yet loving scheme to search for his wife혪s new marriage partner.

Name: Rokuhodo Yotsuiro Biyori
cast_names: Kotaki Nozomu,Hayama Shono,Onishi Ryusei,Saeki Daichi,Shirasu Jin,Fujii Ryusei
tag_names: Adapted From A Manga,Caf챕 Owner,Kind-hearted Male Lead,Caf챕,Miniseries,Share House,Nice Male Lead,Friendship
synopsis: Togoku Kyosui runs a traditional Japanese style cafe called Rokuhodo. He has a tender voice and hardly ever raises it. He is an honest person with a bright personality. At the cafe Togoku Kyosui works with three other young men. They each wear a kimono and serve drinks, meals and deserts to their customers. These 4 men interact with their customers, who all have their own problems, and provide them with comfort. While performing their jobs, they also face their own problems and grow as a person.

Six students go up against the principal. The students are Manaka Taisei, Domon Ryuhei, Takigawa Yusuke, Oura Hyuma, Morimura Naoya and Sakurai Ichika.

Name: Nimit Marn

synopsis: Tawarat was born disfigured and weird looking. He was very rebellious and tortured many girls. He was a womanizer who mistreated women and beat them up if he didnt get his way. One day his father died and Tawarat was left in the big house cursed. All the workers left his side because they couldn't stand his meanness. Years past and he became the ghost of that house. Pakwan moved in the apartment with her friend Temjai. The apartment was next to Tawarat's big mansion. In the eyes of people, that house was so old and ugly. The owner of the apartment was weird and dressed weird. The owner of the apartment's mother had an affair with Tawarat but later killed herself because she didn't want to be Tawarat's slave. Tawarat was a powerful ghost that can change his looks to someone very handsome. He would make Pakwan dream of him because he wanted Pakwan to be his. The owner of the apartments would help Tawarat because she wanted to help and see her dead mother escape from Tawarat. Pana is a photographer who takes pictures of superstition activities who also moves in one of the apartments too. He later on helps Pakwan to discover the true story behind Tawarat and his ugliness.

Name: Passion of Love
cast_names: Jake Cuenca,Arci Mu챰oz,Ejay Falcon,Joseph Marco,Coleen Garcia,Wendell Ramos
synopsis: The remake of the Colombian telenovela hit is about the Samonte brothers namely Juan, Oscar, Franco, and how they will take revenge over their sister's death Olivia who was killed by Gabriela. They will use their charm to avenge Gabriela by making her daughters Norma, Sari, and Jamie fall for them.

Name: Past, Present, Perfect?
cast_names: Loisa Andalio,Vin Abrenica,Shaina Magdayao,Angeli Nicole Sanoy,Elijah Canlas,Allan Paule
tag_names: Age Gap [Drama Life],Age Gap [Real Life],Regret,Rejection,Flashback To Past,Different Timelines,Older Man/Younger Woman,Dream,Miniseries,High School
synopsis: A student with a gift for words, Shantal uses her talent to woo her crush, her high school professor Daniel (Vin Abrenica), by secretly writing him poems and declarations of love. As they become close because of their love for literature, Daniel, recognizing her potential, urges her to pursue her dream of becoming an award-winning writer. Shantal's world is turned upside down when she confesses her feelings for Daniel and gets rejected at their graduation ball. In the present, Shantal navigates adulthood and struggles to pay for her bills by translating text books and subtitling porn - a far cry from her dream to write poetry and novels. Things go awry for Shantal when she experiences writer's block, unable to come up with a solid follow-up to her first successful romance pocket book. Will Shantal be able to find renewed faith in herself and write the stories she wants to tell? What lessons from her past will help her shape the future chapters of her life?

Name: Love vs Stars
cast_names: Miles Ocampo,Kokoy de Santos,Khalil  Ramos,Adrianna So,Angeli Nicole Sanoy,Ivan Andrew Payawal
tag_names: Astrology,Ex-Boyfriend Comes Back,Break Up,Best Friends,Love Triangle
synopsis: Luna believes in two things혰love and astrology. But to be with the one she loves, she has to defy the stars. Is this a battle she can win?

Name: Taiwan That You Love
cast_names: Barbie Imperial,Paulo Angeles,Stephen Rong,Melvin Sia,Romnick Sarmenta,Eddie Ngo
tag_names: Miniseries,Web Series,Filmed Abroad
synopsis: Ivi, a girl who decided to live her dreams in Taiwan when she followed her longtime boyfriend, Eric. To earn allowance and to help with the living expenses, Ivi started an underground walking tour in Taipei with her best friend. During one of her misadventures, Ivi crosses paths with Wei Ting. The two unintentionally knock down a stranger who turns out to be the Matchmaking God, Yue Lao. Yue Lao claims that Ivi is the next Matchmaking Goddess and to break free from the curse, she needs to accomplish a mission so that she will not end alone forever. As Ivi finds the pressure burdensome to keep up with Eric, she also finds herself getting confused as she becomes closer with Wei Ting. Who among Eric and Wei Ting will become the "best man" who's deserving for Ivi's love?

Name: Gou Gou, the Cat 2: Good Good The Fortune Cat

Name: Home Drama

synopsis: In a house in the outskirts of Tokyo, there lives a family of eight. Such a large family is rare these days; however, not one is related by blood. They all lost a loved one in the same holiday accident. Moved by Shogo's suggestion that they all move in together, they have gathered in this house. Each of them has their own issues, making for the start of a tumultuous home life. Tsuyoshi Domoto stars as the passionate yet sentimental lead, Shogo. Diametrically opposed in character and thinking is Tomohiko (Yusuke Santamaria). The story centres on these two as they butt heads at every turn, and the eight grow closer together as a family. This is a human drama full of heart and mixed with laughs and tears depicting a group of deeply wounded people beginning to believe in tomorrow and live life more positively.

cast_names: Kobayashi Satomi,Kana,Mitsuishi Ken,Shiomi Sansei,Motai Masako,Minami

Name: Gold Leaf

synopsis: In 1949, the only daughter of the largest tea factory in Taiwan was supposed to marry a man to take over her life and her father혪s huge business. After she divorced, who was her own master became a question. To prove her worth, she intervenes in the family business that was in high debt. In an era when there was no "businesswoman", she led the crumbling tea factory to the world in the "tea wars혬.

Name: Kon Katsu Tantei

Name: Mashin Sentai Kiramager

screenwriter: Arakawa Naruhisa,  Sanjo Riku,  Shimo Ayumi
cast_names: Komiya Rio,Kihara Rui,Shinjo Yume,Mizuishi Atomu,Kudo Mio,Kohei Shoji
tag_names: Magic,Alien,Fantasy Kingdom,Eccentric Male Lead,Nice Male Lead
synopsis: A princess from a land of jewelry and KiramaStones comes to Earth in search of people with a 혫shining spirit혬 called Kiramental, a source of outstanding charm and talent. She seeks them out to make them into warriors to defend Earth from an evil army. Five are chosen by the KiramaStones, which transform into sentient vehicle companions known as Mashins. Using these powers, they fight the evil army bent on robbing people of their hope and radiance.

Name: Yu Zui
cast_names: Wu You,Zhang Yi Shan,Pu Tao,Zhang Yu Jian,Panda Sun,Raquel Xu
